Name: Asian Heart Institute, Mumbai
About Hospital: ['Established in 2002, Asian Heart Institute (AHI) is India’s number 1 heart care hospital providing world-class cardiac care.', 'Hospital has treated more than 300,000 patients, 20,000 heart surgeries and 35,000 angiographies.', 'The hospital has pioneered treatment of complex heart surgeries with a staggering success rate of 99.8% in bypass surgeries and 99.4% in cardiac surgeries, which is the highest success rate in the world.', '', '', '', '', '', '']

Hospital has experienced and dedicated professionals who have been with the hospital since inception.
Treatments offered by AHI includes Bypass & Redo Bypass Surgeries using arterial grafts, Valve Surgeries & Redo Valve Surgeries, Valve with Bypass Surgery & multiple heart operation in a single patient, Aneurysm Surgeries, Heart Transplant & Artificial Heart, Pediatric Heart Surgeries, Angiography & Angioplasty, Pacemaker, AICD, CRT-D implantation, Baloon Valvuloplasty and Non-surgical Closure of Heart Defects.

It is one of the most advanced hospitals in Hyderabad.', 'The hospital has +30 departments and offers treatments for specialities and sub-specialities in cosmetic surgery, bariatric surgery, diabetology, neurology and neurosurgery, gastroenterology, urology, uncontrolled diabetes, preventive medicine, cardiology, endocrinology, orthopedics, and ENT among several others. It has a Covid-19 vaccination centre and also treats cases of bird flu, swine flu and Zika virus.', 'The hospital has been performing primary and revision total knee replacement surgeries since 2017, following the guidelines from the National Pharmaceutical Pricing Authority (NPPA) vide Government of India order dated 16th August 2017. Also,with effect from 1st April, 2019, Apollo Hospitals at has its revised stent pricing all its locations .', '', '', '', '', '', '']

Team And Speciality: Apollo Hospital, Hyderguda is a multi-speciality healthcare facility renowned for the treatments that it offers across various departments such as, cosmetic surgery, bariatric surgery, diabetology, neurology and neurosurgery, gastroenterology, urology, uncontrolled diabetes, preventive medicine, cardiology, endocrinology, orthopedics and ENT. The medical team at the hospital is highly-qualified and experienced. The consultants, surgeons and doctors are committed to patient care and this results in successful outcomes. The nurses and technicians are skilled too.

Location:

Team And Speciality:
Medicover Hospital, in Arilova, Vishakhapatanam or Health City is a super-speciality hospital. It core specialities are, cardiology, orthopedics, neurosciences, nephrology, emergency care and internal medicine. Besides these specialities, the hospital also offers treatments for, nephrology, emergency medicine, gynecology & obstetrics, urology, medical oncology, ENT, internal medicine, pulmonology, dermatology, clinical nutrition & dietetics, ophthalmology, neonatology, PT, preventive and wellness care, advanced diagnostics and anesthesiology. The hospital is also reputed for conducting surgeries such as, cardiothoracic surgery, neurosurgery, kidney transplant, onco surgery, minimal access surgery, spine surgery, general surgery and plastic & cosmetic surgery. 
The hospital conitnues to deliver excellent clinical outcomes through its medical team at the hospital. The team is highly educated and experienced. Special care is taken for the departments of neonatology and gynaecology. A gynaecologist and neonatologist are available 24*7 to attend to any emergency.
  More Details
Location:
In order to reach Medicover Hospital, Arilova, Vishakhapatanam or Health City, one can opt for a private car or a hired cab from Vishakhapatanam International Airport, Andhra Pradesh. This is a distance of about 20 km and takes about 45 minutes by either of the two routes.
The other option is to take a bus. It takes about an hour and 30 minutes.

Name: Centre for Sight Eye Hospital, Ramganj, Ajmer
About Hospital: ['Centre for Sight Eye Hospital, Ramganj, Ajmer is among the most reputed eye-care hospitals, in Beawar, Ajmer.', 'It is a collaboration, between Dr. Khunger’s Eye Care Centre and the Centre for Sight New Vision Group, that came into existence in 2011.  ', 'The single-speciality hospital carries the legacy of the Centre for Sight – New Vision group, viz. that of excellent clinical expertise and comprehensive eye-care.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
Team And Speciality:
Centre for Sight Eye Hospital, Ramganj, Ajmer is reputed for the very advanced surgeries and treatments that it offers in eye-care. The hospital is renowned for cataract eye surgery, glaucoma treatment, conditions of the retina & uvea, neuro-ophthalmology, LASIK & refractive surgery, paediatric ophthalmology & squint, oculoplasty and ocular oncology. It also offers treatments for other ocular conditions such as, ocular surface & dry eye disorders, computer vision syndrome, squint treatments in adults, retinonblastoma, ocular emergencies and keratoconous. In addition to this, the hospital provides low vision aids that have proven to correct disorders in vision.
In addition to the above, the hospital also offers the following diagnostic services such as, A-scan, Auto refraction, B-scan, Fundus photography, gonioscopy, indirect ophthalmoscopy, non-contact tonometry, pereimetry Humphrey, topography, visual field, YAG laser and wave scan.
Location:
From Ajmer Airport, Kishangarh, Centre for Sight Eye Hospital, Ramganj, Ajmer is easily accesible in 50 minutes at the earliest if you take NH448. The other two routes can take anywhere upto an hour and 30 minutes. A private car or a hired cab is a good option.
Plenty of places to eat and stay options are mostly, semi-luxury.

Medical Departments: ['OPTHALMOLOGY (3)']
Team And Speciality:
The Centre for Sight Eye Hospital, Juhu Vile Parle is a leading eye-care hospital for LASIK surgery, SMILE eye surgery, oculoplasty, ocular oncology surgeries. One of the advanced treatments it offers is, the blade-free Lasik (Femto Lasik) that uses the latest femtosecond laser technology, which is an advanced technique over the microkeratome. This technique creates a more precise and uniform corneal flap, enabling a safer and more precise vision correction procedure.
It also treats computer vision syndrome, all kinds of refractive errors such as myopia, hyperopia, astigmatism and presbyopia. Some of the other conditions it treats are, advanced retina services, cornea, glaucoma, paediatric squint, ocular surface & dry eye disorders, neuro ophthalmology, squint treatments in adults, retinoblastoma, keratoconous and low vision.
The Centre for Sight Eye Hospital, Juhu Vile Parle has an excellent team comprising some of the best Lasik and refractive surgeons who accurately diagnose the conditions and deliver excellent clinical outcomes. The success rates of the surgeons at the centre are commendable.

For such a short distance of about four km, it is advsiable to travel by a rickshaw or any other public transport which is easily available.   
There are BEST buses too that ply from the airport to the hospital.

', 'The hospital is the first priority of patients with ophthalmic conditions that require LASIK & refractive surgeries, cataract eye surgeries, besides treating glaucoma, cornea & retina conditions, pediatric ophthalmology and squint treatment, neuro-ophthalmology, oculoplasty and ocular oncology. Some routine disorders the hospital offers treatments for are, ocular surface & dry eye disorders, computer vision syndrome, retinoblastoma and keratoconous treatment. It also provides low-vision aids for certain treatments.', '', '', '']
Team And Speciality:
Centre for Sight Eye Hospital, Kanth Road, Moradabad conducts LASIK & refractive surgeries, cataract eye surgeries, besides treating glaucoma, cornea & retina conditions, pediatric ophthalmology and squint treatment, neuro-ophthalmology, oculoplasty and ocular oncology. Some routine disorders the hospital offers treatments for are, ocular surface & dry eye disorders, computer vision syndrome, retinoblastoma and keratoconous treatment. It also provides low-vision aids for certain treatments.
The team of ophthalmologists and surgeons are senior and experienced medical professionals.
Location:
Centre for Sight Eye Hospital, Kanth Road, Moradabad is located seven hours from Moradabad Mundha Pande Airport, Moradabad. This translates into a distance of 360 km. Alternatively one may consider the Pantnagar Airport and the Bareilly Air Force Station which are 71 and 80 km away from the hospital. The next best option could be travelling from Dehradun Airport, Dehradun and the Indira Gandhi International Airport, Delhi which are 162 km and 167 kms from the hospital.
The hospital's vicinity has good dine-out options and budget stay options.

Name: The Ajou University Hospital, Suwon-si
About Hospital: ['The Ajou University Hospital was opened in September 1994, dedicated to providing the best medical treatment with sophisticated and modern medical and surgical technologies. ', 'It is a multispeciality hospital consisting of medical centres that are specialised by disease types such as 10 Cancer Centres focusing on different organs, a Cardiovascular Centre, a Comprehensive Care Centre for Osteoarthritis, a Centre for Torticollis, a Children’s Growth & Obesity Centre, an Integrative Care Centre, a GammaKnife Centre, an Organ Transplant Centre, the Ajou Sports Medicine Centre, the Ajou Hearing Centre to mention a few. There are 21 such medical centres. In addition to this, there are 41 Clinical departments and 3 Specialised Clinics, namely, Genetics Clinic, Pain Clinic, and Child Psychiatry Clinic.', 'In the field of Cancer surgery, it was ranked first in the evaluation of medical treatment of stomach cancer, large intestine cancer, breast cancer, and lung cancer from the Review & Assessment Service of the National Health Insurance Corporation.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
Team And Speciality: With state-of-the-art medico-surgical equipment and facilities, the medical professionals work to perform organ transplants, highly complex cardio surgeries, cancer surgeries, and other operations across a wide range of clinical departments.
Infrastructure: ['Since it was established in 1994, the Ajou University Hospital consists of a  14- storey building Hospital, a Wellbeing Centre, Songjaegwan (Ajou University School of Medicine), Hongjaegwan (Ajou University College of Nursing), a Regional Emergency Medical Centre, a Southern Gyeonggi Trauma Centre, and a Funeral home. They are all multi-storey buildings.', 'It has 28 operating rooms including an exclusive robot-equipped operating room.', 'The Intensive Care Unit (ICU) comprises separate sections for internal medicine, general surgery, neurology, cardiology, neonatal, and emergency care. The ICU has EKG monitors, ventilators, and pacemakers. It is under 24/7 vigilance.', '']
Location:
The Hospital is easily accessible by Gyeongbu Expressway, Yeongdong Expressway, and other major national roads.
The closest international airport is the Gimpo International Airport. There are several Airport Shuttle Service Providers near the Hospital. Airport limousine services are also available.
There are several hotels, eateries, and banks nearby.

About Hospital: ['ART Fertility Clinics, Hyderabad is a among the most-sought after single-speciality hospital for fertility in Hyderabad. ', 'The hospital was set up in April 2021 and is among the 18 such hospitals that the ART Fertility Clinics group is looking to set up in the popular Indian cities. It is an apex healthcare facility in reproductive medicines and genetics and is the only medical entity that conducts localised R&D that aims to determine the prime cause of infertility. ', 'ART Fertility Clinics, Hyderabad was started to offer fertility treatments such as, fertility work-up, intracytoplasmic sperm injection (ICSI), IVF, IUI, blastocyst culture, cryopreservation, laser-assisted hatching, genetic services -PGT-A/PGT-SR - PGT-M, andrology services - TESA/PESA/MESA, Micro-TESE, hysteroscopy- diagnostic/operative, embryo/oocyte donation and laparoscopy. The hospital also examines and diagnoses male infertility with semen analysis and FNA. ', '', '', '']
Medical Departments: ['GYNECOLOGY (2)', 'IVF and INFERTILITY (2)']
Team And Speciality:
ART Fertility Clinics, Hyderabad commenced operations to offer fertility treatments such as, fertility work-up, intracytoplasmic sperm injection (ICSI), IVF, IUI, blastocyst culture, cryopreservation, laser-assisted hatching, genetic services -PGT-A/PGT-SR - PGT-M, andrology services - TESA/PESA/MESA, Micro-TESE, hysteroscopy- diagnostic/operative, embryo/oocyte donation and laparoscopy. The hospital also examines and diagnoses male infertility with semen analysis and FNA. 
As a part of understanding the cause of infertility, the hospital also offers counselling as a part of its treatments. Thus, it offers customised treatments based on their analysis and conditions of the patient.
The doctors, embryologists and the nursing staff at the hospital are well-trained and as compassionate when interacting with the patients. They are dedicated and prompt in delivering customised treatments.
Top Doctors: ['Dr. Lakshmi Krishna Leela', 'Dr. Geetha.V']
Location:
From Rajiv Gandhi International Airport, Hyderabad to ART Fertility Clinics, Hyderabad, it takes up to a little over an hour if one takes the PV Narsimha Rao Expy and 43 minutes by the Nehru Outer Ring Road. Depending on the route, the distance is upto 35 km. Alternatively, there are buses that run between the airport and the hospital. 
The vicinity of the hospital offers many continental and regular dine out options. Stay options are also modestly priced.

About Hospital: ['Asklepios St. Georg Hospital is a multispeciality center located in Hamburg and is a part of the Asklepios Medical Group.', 'The group which houses a network of 150 medical establishments in 14 federal districts of Germany making it one of the largest private hospital group in Germany with 26,500 beds combined.', 'The hospital is certified by the International Organization for Standardization, Switzerland, and the Center for Transcatheter Aortic Valve Implantation, Germany.', '', '', '', '']

Asklepios St. Georg Hospital employs approximately 13,000 people of all skill levels (including more than 2,000 physicians) and thus one of the largest employers in the city.

Name: Baskent University Hospital
About Hospital: ['The Istanbul Baskent Hospital or the Baskent University Istanbul Health Practice and Research Center was established in February 23, 2007, through funding received from the Baskent University, one of the leading hospital groups in Turkey and the Middle East.', 'It is a well-known Organ & Tissue Transplantation Centre with a total of 4065 successful transplantations done in the Liver, Kidney, Heart and Corneal. In fact, Prof. Mehmet Haberal, MD the founder of Baskent University is the President-Elect of The Transplantation Society, an international organ transplantation congress.', 'It is a multi-speciality Hospital with over 60 Departments, Centres, Services, and Clinics that provides outpatient and inpatient clinics; it also has a Dialysis Centre.', '', '', '']
Team And Speciality:
The Hospital has over 80 well-qualified doctors, experienced in their respective fields. Among them are also professors who practice clinically and academically.
The quality of the Hospital is reflected in the numerous award-winning doctors it has.
It has more than 10 Clinics such as Foot Health Clinic, Alzheimer's Disease Outpatient Clinic, Breast Diseases Outpatient Clinic.
More Details
Infrastructure: ['The Hospital has an indoor area of 13,000 square metres with an inpatient clinic occupying two floors.', 'It has a total number of 126 bed that spreads over various Units such as 21 beds at the Palliative Care Center, the Neonatal Intensive Care Unit has12  beds, the Anesthesia and Reanimation Intensive Care Unit with 10 beds, the Coronary Intensive Care Unit with 7 beds, the Cardiovascular Surgery Intensive Care Unit with 6 beds and finally, with a capacity of 70 Patient beds .', 'It has a "Code Blue" emergency warning system and telemetric monitoring for emergency purposes so that the response team can immediately attend to any patient.']
Location:
The Hospital is located in the area of Altunizade, Istanbul about 27 minutes away from the Sabiha Gokcen International Airport depending on traffic.
Hotels are a bit further away from the Hospital except the Holiday Inn Express and Mercure Istanbul Altunizade that are just a minute drive. Otherwise, Hotels are aplenty in the further NEWS part of the Hospital if one does not mind travel around 15 minutes. Hotel price range from USD 31.00 and goes as high as USD 400+ depending on the location and quality.
There are plenty of pharmacies to be found within a 4 km radius. The nearest is just a minute drive.
Shopping malls are sparsely located but the closest is Capitol AVM which is a 5-minute drive.
There are lots of taxi services like the Baglarbasi Meydan Taxi or the Union Taxi that can be called for services.
There are many delectable restaurants offering many options within a 5-minute drive.

Dr. Nasser Loza, President-Elect of the World Federation for Mental Health (WMFH). About Hospital: ['Buddhachinaraj Phitsanulok Hospital is the main hospital of Phitsanulok Province, Thailand and is classified under the Ministry of Public Health (MOPH) as a regional hospital.', 'The hospital was founded in 1940 and has gradually expanded since then. ', 'It has a CPIRD Medical Education Center which trains doctors of the Faculty of Medicine, Naresuan University.', '', '', '', '', '']

Team And Speciality:
More than 100 doctors work at the hospital, all of them are highly specialised and trained in various specialties of medicine.
All of the workforce adheres to a high quality of Thai service, and English is spoken in every department.
It also serves as a teaching hospital for the Faculty of Medicine at Prince of Songkhla University, and is accredited for residency training in internal medicine, obstetrics and gynaecology, orthopaedics, paediatrics, and surgery as part of the Collaborative Project to Increase Production of Rural Doctors (CPIRD).
Infrastructure: ['Advanced technologies such as Single Photon Emission Computed Tomography (SPECT), Positron Emission Tomography Computed Tomography (PET-CT), Bone Densitometer, and others are available at the hospital.', 'It has a total capacity of 1063 beds with a variety of accommodation types.', 'A library, a sports centre, a dormitory, and a post office are all located there.', 'There are several cafés, restaurants, and other convenience businesses to choose from.']

Name: Bumrungrad International Hospital, Bangkok
About Hospital: ['Established on 17 September 1980, the Bumrungrad International Hospital, Bangkok is a global pioneer in giving the best international standard healthcare services and one of the largest private multi-speciality hospitals in South East Asia with patients coming from over 190 countries annually.', 'It is a one-stop healthcare destination for all types of patients with the ability to handle complex care needs.', 'It practices a one-price policy for all patients regardless of whether they are local or international patients ensuring the principle value of "care for the people."  ', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

The Hospital employs over 1,300 medical doctors, 900 registered nurses and over 4,800 support professionals covering 70 sub-specialties.
Many of the doctors have international board certifications from countries like the USA, UK, Japan, and Australia.
The hospital has multidisciplinary teams of experienced medical doctors, nurses, pharmacists, physical therapists, nutritionists, medical technologists and other professional staff.
Top Doctors: ['Dr. Kittichai Luengtaviboon', 'Dr. Savitree Maoleekoonpairoj', 'Assoc. Prof. Dr. Areesak Chotivichit', 'Adjunct Assoc. Prof. Dr. Sasitorn Siritho']
Infrastructure: ['The Hospital has a 24/7 Emergency Room, 19 Operating Theatres, 4 types of ICUs (adult, pediatric, cardiac, and a Level III neonatal ICU), 2 Cath Labs, 6 Labor & delivery rooms, 1 Bi-plane room, 7 Endoscopy rooms, and a Rehabilitation Centre.', 'All Bumrungrad International rooms consist of several amenities such as imported electronically adjustable beds, a Computerized personal nurse call system, a television, a guest couch, individually controlled room air conditioning, a personal telephone for local and international calls, and a personal medication cabinet.', 'It has two Cardiac Catheterization Labs, a Surgical Navigation System along with Arthroscopy, Endoscopy, and Lithotripsy, and Interventional Radiology capabilities.', '', '', '']

The Hospital is located in the heart of the city of Bangkok.
It takes about 37 minutes from the Suvarnabhumi International Airport and about 25 minutes from the Don Mueang International Airport.
Many 3 to 5-hotels can be found nearby the Hospital. The lowest price cost about USD 17 within a radium of about 2 km.

The nearest bus stops just near to the Hospital. Nana is the closest subway station; it can be reached by ferry as well.
Taxi services are also plenty to commute around.

Name: The Catholic University of Korea- Yeouido St. Mary’s Hospital
About Hospital: ['Yeouido St. Mary\'s Hospital was established on 11 May, 1936 with four doctors focusing on internal medicine and paediatrics. After 80 years, it has progressively evolved and expanded itself, responding to the medical needs of the environment and aiming to become a "patient-centered futuristic hospital." In 2010, its name was changed to the Catholic University of Korea Yeouido St. Mary\'s Hospital. The Catholic University Yeouido St. Mary\'s Hospital is Korea Catholic\'s first formal hospital.', 'The Hospital is multidisciplinary with 31 Clinical departments and 15 Care Centres. Through its spiritual inclination, it offers a holistic treatment and medical service. It therefore, has a comprehensive system of care from beginning of life to the end.', 'In 2011, it acquired the medical institution certificate from the Ministry of Health and Welfare for the first time.', '', '', '', '', '', '']

Other care centres are the Cardiovascular Centre, Cranial Nerve Centre, Dental Centre, Emergency Medical Centre, General Health Checkup Centre, Hepatobiliary Centre, Integrated Pain Centre, Ophthalmology Centre, and the Spine Centre.

Name: Charite University Hospital
About Hospital: ["The Charité University Hospital located in Berlin is one of Europe's most reputed and largest university hospitals affiliated with Humboldt University and Free University Berlin. ", "Established in 1710, it is one of Germany's most research-intensive medical institutions, which was ranked by Focus as the best of over 1000 hospitals in Germany.", 'In 2010, the clinic celebrated its 300th anniversary, and in 2019 and 2020, Newsweek ranked the Charité as the fifth-best hospital in the world and best in Europe.', '', '', '', '']
Medical Departments: ['CARDIOLOGY AND CARDIAC SURGERY (5)', 'COSMETIC AND PLASTIC SURGERY (1)', 'ENDOCRINOLOGY (1)', 'ENT SURGERY (1)', 'GASTROENTEROLOGY (3)', 'GENERAL SURGERY (1)', 'GYNECOLOGY (2)', 'HEMATOLOGY (2)', 'NEPHROLOGY (2)', 'NEUROLOGY AND NEUROSURGERY (6)', 'OBESITY OR BARIATRIC SURGERY (1)', 'ONCOLOGY AND ONCOSURGERY (4)', 'OPTHALMOLOGY (1)', 'ORTHOPEDICS (3)', 'PEDIATRIC CARDIOLOGY (1)', 'PEDIATRICS AND PEDIATRIC SURGERY (6)', 'PULMONOLOGY (1)', 'RHEUMATOLOGY (1)', 'SPINE SURGERY (2)', 'TRANSPLANT SURGERY (1)', 'UROLOGY TREATMENT (2)', 'VASCULAR SURGERY (1)']
Team And Speciality:
Charite is known in Germany for its world-renowned doctors, among which 11 are Nobel prize winners.
Nearly 9,797 doctors and scientists work in Charite with 261 of them are professors, 4,293 nurses, and 725 administrative employees.
The specialists of Charite have found a new therapeutic approach to the treatment of pneumonia and also developed an anesthetic method without side effects in the form of an effect on the brain or intestine.
More Details
Top Doctors: ['Prof. Dr. Claudia Spies', 'Prof. Dr. Angelika Eggert', 'Prof. Dr. Kurt Miller', 'Prof. Dr. Thorsten Schlomm']
Infrastructure: ['Charité has four campuses across Berlin including Campus Benjamin Franklin, Campus Charité Mitte, Campus Virchow-Klinikum, and Campus Berlin Buch, which takes up to 540,000 square meters of land.', 'The campuses concentrate mainly on super-specialized departments such as Neurology, Oncology, Cardiology, Rare Diseases & Genetics, Regenerative Therapies, Immunological Sciences, etc.', 'The hospital has a bed strength of 3,011 beds.']

About Hospital: ['Chonbuk National University Hospital (CBNU) is a reputed national multi-specialty hospital in the Jeollabuk-do region, South Korea which was founded in 1909 by the government of South Korea. ', 'CBNU has over 1,000 beds overall and has the reputation of treating 9,00,000 outpatients and 3,60,000 inpatients and performing 17,000 surgeries. The hospital has a dedicated and highly-qualified team of medical professionals in specialised centers to treat pediatrics, respiratory diseases, geriatrics, cancer, emergencies and to undertake clinical research.

Nationally-designated laboratories for renal generation and airway remodeling control.

Name: Chonnam National University Hospital
About Hospital: ["The Chonnam National University Hospital (CNUH) started in 1910 as Jahye Clinic with just 10 employees. After 110 years, it has grown into the largest multi-hospital system having 3000 employees. It has also gained respect as Koreas's top tier general hospital and a global hospital.", 'Being a multispeciality hospital, it has 38 clinical departments and 7 Specialised Centres.', "CNUH opened a clinic for international patients in 1998. Over the years, with an increase in foreign patients, the clinic gradually expanded to become an International Medical Centre which was created in 2014. It aims to increase convenience and efficacy of service to meet the growing needs of international patients. The International Medical Centre is located in the Children's Hospital on the 1st Floor.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
Medical Departments: ['CARDIOLOGY AND CARDIAC SURGERY (1)', 'GASTROENTEROLOGY (3)', 'GENERAL SURGERY (1)', 'HEPATOLOGY (3)', 'NEUROLOGY AND NEUROSURGERY (1)', 'OBESITY OR BARIATRIC SURGERY (1)', 'ORTHOPEDICS (1)']

Located in the south-western part of Korea, The Chonnam National University Hospital is located in the city of Gwangju.

Medical Departments: ['CARDIOLOGY AND CARDIAC SURGERY (4)', 'COSMETIC AND PLASTIC SURGERY (1)', 'GASTROENTEROLOGY (2)', 'GENERAL SURGERY (1)', 'HEMATOLOGY (1)', 'HEPATOLOGY (1)', 'NEPHROLOGY (1)', 'NEUROLOGY AND NEUROSURGERY (2)', 'OBESITY OR BARIATRIC SURGERY (1)', 'ONCOLOGY AND ONCOSURGERY (3)', 'ORTHOPEDICS (1)', 'PULMONOLOGY (1)', 'SPINE SURGERY (1)', 'TRANSPLANT SURGERY (1)']

Team And Speciality:
Sanar International Hospital provides extensive medical procedures backed up with our state-of-the-art technology and a team of highly qualified & experienced clinical experts.
It has more than 20 + specialties, such as Anesthesiology, General Medicine, Ophthalmology, Cardiac Sciences, General Surgery & Surgical, Gastroenterology, Orthopedics, Cardiothoracic Surgery, Hematology, Pediatrics, Critical Care Medicine, Hepato Biliary Surgery, and Liver Transplantation.
The hospital is proud to have a team of highly trained Cardiology doctors on its panel, and they give the finest treatment for your loved ones.

Name: Cleopatra Hospital
About Hospital: ['The Cleopatra Hospital listed on the Egyptian Stock Exchange in 2016, is Egypt’s largest private hospital group by a number of hospital beds and number of operating hospitals.', 'The Hospital is established in 2014, has two Polyclinics i.e, New Cairo Polyclinic located in East Cairo, and  El Sheikh Zayed Polyclinic is located in Majaraah, in West Cairo.', 'Dr. Mohamed Saad Hangras is a well-known Cardiologist in Cleopatra, with a thriving experience of more than 30 years. He is a professor of Cardiothoracic Surgery Kasr El Ainy and a fellow of San Donato Clinic, University of Milan Italy. He is also a member of the Egyptian Association of Cardiac and Chest Surgery.', '', '', '', '']

Several doctors of Cleopatra Hospital are pioneers in the highest category of medicine and are actively engaged in medical science, university education, clinical research, and active participation in the scientific associations.
The hospital has a dedicated team in 50 specialties with over 1,500 resident doctors and consultants and 900 nursing staff which includes expert nurses, physicians, and other healthcare professionals to provide the highest standards of medical treatment.

Name: Cleveland Clinic, Abu Dhabi
About Hospital: ['An extension of Cleveland Clinic in USA, the Cleveland Clinic Abu Dhabi was established in 2015 to provide services for complex and critical care and to develop a rich, world-class healthcare infrastructure within the country.', 'Being a multispecialty hospital, it spreads across 14 Institutes and 40 medical and surgical specialities with state-of-the-art technologies and unparalleled patient care.', 'It prides itself in its 6 Centres of Excellence comprising Heart & Vascular Institute, Neurological Institute, Eye Institute, Respiratory Institute, and Critical Care Institute.', '', '', '', '', '']
Hospital Address: ['Island - 59 Hamouda Bin Ali Al Dhaheri St', 'Abu Dhabi', '', 'United Arab Emirates']
Team And Speciality:
It has a Service Excellence Training Programme for all caregivers that is specifically tailored to suit cultural sensitivities whilst caring for the patient and interacting with their families. This is to support the Clinic's model of care and prioritising patient-centred care.
The highly qualified and experienced doctors come from varied cultural backgrounds and most of them speak at least two languages, mainly English and/or Arabic. They have more than 10 years of experience in their respective fields with North American Board certifications or equivalent certifications.
Its Medical specialities include those that are prevalent amongst the communities in Abu Dhabi such as Endocrinology, Dermatology, Orthopaedics, Nephrology etc. 
More Details
Infrastructure: ['The Hospital stands on a sprawling 409,234 sq metres floor area having 5 clinical floors, 3 diagnostics and treatment levels, 13 floors for critical and acute inpatient units.', 'It has 364 beds (expandable to 490 beds) with 26 Operating Rooms, 72 ICU beds and 4 Post Anesthesia Care Units (PACU).', 'It 20,000 numbers of medical equipment and 20,000 pieces of IT equipment; some of the cutting-edge equipment are SPECT.CT scanners and PET.CT scanners.', 'It has a well-stocked 24x7 Pharmacy and a 24x7 Emergency.', 'It also has retail services such as cafes, beauty salon, flower shop, grocery store etc.', 'In addition, it has a Business Centre, Events & Conference Centre, and a Childcare service.']
Location:
The Hospital is located on the island of Al Maryah in the northeastern part of Abu Dhabi.
The Abu Dhabi International Airport is 37 minutes away from the Hospital depending on traffic. A regional airport, the Al Bateen Airport is about 18 minutes drive.
Many hotels are available within a 3.5 km radius outside the island locality with prices ranging from USD 41 to 120.00 (approx) depending on the quality. There are two 5 star hotels within a 4-minute drive with a price starting from USD 150. Alternately, there are several furnished apartments and guest houses. 
Several pharmacies can be found within 1 - 5 minutes drive.
There are some shopping malls nearby and scrumptious eateries offering different cuisines.
Taxi services, car and limousine rentals are available for sightseeing, leisure, and tours.

Name: Clinic Alyssa, Tunis
About Hospital: ['Founded in 2002, the Clinic Alyssa, Tunis is a private hospital establishment, which was established with the motto of "Well-being and security". ', 'With a capacity of 40 beds, it has a multidisciplinary high-tech technical platform covering an area of 4000 m² on the shores of Lake Tunis. ', 'Accredited by the Ministry of Health, the clinic has registered itself on the world map of medical tourism and offers a variety of services including gynecology, pediatrics, neonatology, emergency medical care, orthopedic surgery, gastric surgery, plastic surgery, and general surgery.', '', '', '', '']
Medical Departments: ['COSMETIC AND PLASTIC SURGERY (7)']
Team And Speciality:
Alyssa Clinic is a multispecialty clinic with various departments including obstetrics and gynecology, pediatrics, and neonatology.
Other than maternity care, the clinic also treats patients requiring emergency medical care, orthopedic surgery, gastric surgery, plastic surgery, and general surgery.
An extensively experienced medical and para-medical staff works 24*7 to ensure optimal treatment and resuscitation for all patients.
More Details
Top Doctors: ['Dr. Moncef Guiga', 'Dr. Chennoufi Mehdi', 'Dr. Azouz Emna', 'Dr. Daghfous Mehdi']
Infrastructure: ['The surgical unit at Clinic Alyssa, Tunis has 4 operating and recovery rooms, which are all equipped with ultra-modern equipment to suffice with the international standards and ensure safety and optimal comfort.', 'Covering an area of 4000 m² on the shores of Lake Tunis, the hospital has a capacity of 40 beds.', "The rooms blend luxury with esthetics and a choice of fabrics, woodwork, along with air-conditioning and a bed with electric drive allowing the backrest to tilt based on the patient's suitability.", 'Moreover, each room has a telephone, a TV set, and toilets with a wash-hand basin. ', 'Also to ensure medical safety, buttons to call male nurses are placed at the top of the bed and in the toilets in case of an emergency.', 'For food and nutrition, 3 menus are proposed to all patients with clear instructions of the dietician and recommendations of the surgeon.']
Location:
Clinic Alyssa, Tunis
Lac Leman, Tunis, Tunisia

Name: Clinic Soukra, Tunis
About Hospital: ['Clinic Soukra, Tunis is a highly specialized hospital serving national as well as international patients since 2003.', 'Established in the year 2003, the clinic was the first to introduce new therapeutic and interventional specialties into the private sector.', 'The hospital is well-known for the creation of the first cérébro-vascular service for the responsibility of the accidents related to vascular and cerebral.', '', '', '', '']
Team And Speciality:
The departments available at Clinic Soukra, Tunis include neurology, neurosurgery, orthopedics, spinal surgery, plastic and cosmetic surgery, physical medicine and rehabilitation, and rheumatology.
The clinic also provides diverse treatments such as Craniotomy, Subdural Hematoma (SDH) Surgery, Brain Aneurysm Repair, Brain Tumor Surgery, Deep Brain Stimulation (DBS) Surgery, ligament surgery, hip & knee replacement, and many more.
Each specialty consists of internationally trained doctors and nurses who work closely in a symbiosis between the medical personnel and administrative available to allow all functions to help patients.
More Details
Infrastructure: ['Clinic Soukra, Tunis is designed on modern architecture and built in a park of 2.5 acres with a surface of 17.000 m2.', 'The clinic has 3 interdependent units with a full capacity of 90 beds for a comfortable stay and personalized services for all patients.', 'Being a multi-field medico-surgical private clinic, it has a general-purpose and orthopedic functional rehabilitation center along with a unit of medical imagery and interventional radiology.', '', '']
Location:
Clinic Soukra, Tunis
Rue Cheikh Mohamed Enneifer, Tunis 2035, Tunisia
The hospital is at a distance of 13.9 km via Tunis Carthage Airport and the drive takes about 18 minutes. Taxis and shuttles are easily available from the airport to the hospital.

The hospital is close to multiple shopping centers and popular restaurants serving international cuisines.

Name: Clinique Avicenne, Tunis
About Hospital: ['Clinique Avicenne was established in 1974. In 1998, new premises were opened on the hill of El Manar, in the city centre of Tunis, the capital of Tunisia.', 'It is a multispeciality clinic which offers its experience in Laser Urology, Neurology, Cardiology, Oncology, ENT, Ophthalmology, Gastroenterology, Cosmetic surgery, Paediatrics, Gynaecology, and Obstetrics.', 'It is equipped with the latest medico-surgical instruments in accordance with the European standards.', '']

The Clinique has over 80 doctors and health specialists who are recognized nationally and internationally.
Its specialties include ENT, Ophthalmological surgery, Cosmetic surgery, Gynaecology, and Obstetrics.
Infrastructure: ['The new premise of the Clinique is built in the strategic area of the city centre of Tunis.', 'It has state-of-art medico-surgical technologies for better diagnosis and treatment.']
Location:
The Tunis-Carthage International Airport is a 10-minute drive from the Clinique.
Clinique Avicenne is well connected with public transportations. The nearest bus stop is the El Manar Bus Stop which is 5-minute walk. The nearest subway stations are La jeunesse and Cite sportive and can be reached in about 2 minutes by car from the Clinique.
A good variety of inter-continental eateries can be found within a radius of 2 kms.

Name: Clinique Carthagene, Tunis
About Hospital: ['Clinique Carthagene or the International Hospital Centre Carthagene is a polyclinic that has one of the best medical, paramedical, and administrative teams in Tunisia equipped with cutting edge technologies and modern approaches to diagnosis and treatment of patients.', 'It is a multidisciplinary clinic that focuses on medical and surgical activities with personalised and optimal patient care.', "With its vision to be a leader in providing quality health care and patient safety both in national and international platforms, the Clinic's Quality Indicator 2020 highlights that 98.54% of patients are satisfied by the overall performance of the Clinic. 98.11% of patients were satisfied with respect to their rights in 2020.", '', '', '']
Team And Speciality:
The Medical speciality includes Gynaecology, Neonatology, Paediatrics, Cardiology, Neurology and Urology. 
The Surgical specialities are performed by experienced surgeons and each of them highly qualified in their respective fields. These specialities include Obstetrics, Heart Surgery, Orthopaedics, Vascular Surgery, Neurosurgery, ENT, Ophthlamology, General Surgery, Pacemaker Implantation, Endoscopic Thoracic Surgery, Maxillofacial Surgery, Urologic Surgery, Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery and Emergency hand surgery. A team of surgeons specialising in hand trauma are always available 24x7, every day.
The Clinic also has "Functional Explorations" service wherein various examinations are done for diagnosis, monitoring, treatment, and surveillance. It has Respiratory Functional Exploration, Cardiac Exploration, Endoscopic Exploration, Laser Vision Centre, Diabetic Foot Centre, Coachlear Implantation Centre, Rehabilitation and Functional Rehabilitation Centre.
More Details
Infrastructure: ['The Clinic has 300 Hospital beds, 14 Operating theatres, 2 Unloading rooms, and 55 Resuscitation beds.', 'It has an Imaging Centre equipped with state-of-the-art technologies like Breast MRI, MRI unit with a 1.5 Tesla device, Scanner Unit with 128 slice scanner  etc.', 'It has a Medical Analysis Laboratory that is sterilised and hygenic.', 'It has a Sterilization department that has 2 units - central sterilization unit and endoscope sterilization unit that are furnished with the latest equipment.', 'There are Resuscitation rooms opened 24x7.', "The Clinic has 140 spacious and aesthetically designed rooms for comfort and recuperation and caters to different budgets. The rooms are also equipped with a phone and paid TV. A hairdresser or beautician can be hired at one's own expense.", 'Meals are developed by a Dietician and choice of meals are available.']
Location:
Clinique Carthagene is ideally located in the heart of the city Tunis and is therefore easily accessible from all locations in the city.
It is 5 minutes away from the Carthage International Airport.
The nearest subway station is El Fell which is 5 -7 minutes away by car depending on the traffic route. The nearest bus stop is 635 which is 4 minutes away from the Clinic by car.
Hotels like the Marriott, Hotel Lafayette, or the Golden Yasmin Hotels are nearby the Clinic.
It is dotted with many pharmacies within a 10 minute walk.
Taxi services or car rentals are available nearby for trips to the mall, restaurants, or tourist destinations.

Name: Clinique El Amen, Nabeul
About Hospital: ['Located in the northeastern part of Tunisia, Clinique El Amen, Nabeul is a multidisciplinary clinic that was established in 2017.', 'It is under the Amen Sante Group which is one of the main promoters and operators of clinics in Tunisia and the largest market share holder of beds as a private sector.', 'Thanks to the Amen Sante Group, the Clinic provides international quality in comfort and stay and managing cost control for the benefit of patients.', '', '', '']
Team And Speciality:
The Clinique is particularly known for its Surgical specialities like Cosmetic and Restorative Surgery, Maxillofacial Surgery, General Surgery, Vascualr Surgery, Orthopaedic Surgery, ENT Surgery, Cancer Surgery, Gynaecology Surgery, Thoracic Surgery, and Urologic Surgery. 
It also has a well-known centre named the Cardiovascular Pole or "Amen Heart" that operates By-pass Surgery, Heart valve Surgery, Congenital Heart diseases, and Thoracic Aortic Surgery.
Its Medical specialities include Neonatal and Paediatric Resuscitation, Gastroenterology, Adult Medico-Surgical Resuscitation, Cardiac sciences, and Gynaeco-Obstetrics.
Infrastructure: ["The Clinique's architectural structure is designed in a way that promotes ambient medical performance and comfort of stay.", 'It has 57 rooms and 126 beds which are spread across the Emergency department, Day hospital, Medicine and Surgery, Multipurpose resuscitation, Cardiological ICU, and Maternity beds.', 'The Gynaeco-Obstetrics department has a dedicated floor that has 3 delivery rooms, 1 Cesarean section with a Gynaecologist, a midwife Anaesthetic and Resuscitator on site.', '', '', '']
Location:
The Clinique is located in the coastal town of Nabeul in northeastern Tunisia and surrounded by the Mediterranean Sea.
The nearest airport is the Enfidha-Hammamen International Airport which is about 50 minutes drive depending on traffic and route taken.
Nabeul Marchandise is the nearest train station which is a 4-minute drive. The nearest bus station is about 7 minutes by car. 
Taxi stations are available within a 9 minute or so drive. 
There are many 3 to 5-star hotels along the coast and guest houses are also nearby with a price ranging from USD 35.00 - 130.00
Many shopping malls, restaurants and cafes are located within a radius of 4 km.  
A night pharmacy is available right across the Clinique and other chemists/pharmacies could be found dotted within a 2 km radius.

Name: Ewha Womans University Medical Centre
About Hospital: ['Ewha Womans University Medical Centre (EUMC) initially started as "Pogoonyogoan" - a house of many sick women in1887. It is the first women\'s hospital in Korea and has been leading Korean women’s medicine ever since its establishment. In November 2015, the current Ewha Womans University Medical Center was founded having both hospitals and medical schools.', 'EUMC is an umbrella organisation consisting of Ewha Institute of Convergence Medicine and Ewha Clinical Trial Center, Ewha Womans University Mokdong Hospital, Ewha Womans University Seoul Hospital, Ewha Womans University Cancer Center for Women, Ewha Womans University, Ewha Womans University College of Medicine, and Ewha Womans University College of Nursing. It also operates Yangcheon-Gangseo Center for Dementia, Yangcheon Center for Mental Health and the Gimpo International Airport Clinic.', "It specialises in women's cancer such as breast cancer, thyroid cancer, and gynaecological cancer. It was selected as the best hospital in colon cancer treatment by the Ministry of Health and Welfare. It also received the best grade in stomach cancer and colon cancer surgery performance by the Ministry of Health and Welfare and the Health Insurance Review and Assessment Service (HIRAS). It was also given the first place as a ‘Good Cancer Center’ in patient satisfaction, in Korea Cancer Center Assessment conducted by a famous daily newspaper, MK Business News, and a global consulting group, Deloitte.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
Medical Departments: ['ONCOLOGY AND ONCOSURGERY (1)']
Team And Speciality:
Being the first and best women-centric hospital in Korea, it specialises in cancer treatment of women with ultra-modern medical facilities. Ewha Womans University Cancer Center for Women is comprised of Breast and Thyroid Cancer Center and Gynaecologic Cancer Center. It works closely with other Centres like the  Robotic Surgery Center and Ewha Innovative Research Center for Control and Prevention of Women’s Cancer etc enabling the Hospital to intricately and accurately understand the complications, diagnosis, and treatment of cancers in women. 
Other specialities of EUMC include Obstetrics ＆ Gynaecology,  Surgery,  Gastroenterology & Hepatology,  Internal Medicine,  Neurology,  Orthopaedic surgery,  Radiation oncology,  Otorhinolaryngology,  Urology,  and Pulmonology.
Top Doctors: ['Dr. Paik Nam-sun']
Infrastructure: ['EUMC is a female-friendly environment with much care and detail given to treatment and facilities. ', 'Understanding the differences in cancer in men and women, it established the Cancer Center for Women which consists of the Breast and Thyroid Cancer Centre, Gynaecologic Cancer Centre, Recurrent Gynaecologic Cancer Centre, and Clinical Genetics Centre. The hospital also works with the Women’s Health Promotion Centre.']
Location:
Ewha Womans University Mokdong Hospital along with the Cancer Centre is located in Mok-dong, Yangcheon-gu, Seoul while Ewha Womans University Seoul Hospital is in Magok-dong, Gangseo-gu, near the Gimpo International Hospital. 
The Hospitals are accessible by the Green and Blue buses, the Airport bus, Express bus, and subways.

Name: Fakih IVF Fertility Centre, Abu Dhabi
About Hospital: ['Fakih IVF Fertility Centre, Abu Dhabi is a single speciality centre established in 2013. Fakih IVF Fertility Centre started in 2011 in Dubai with the vision of Dr Micheal Fakih, an experienced and award winning doctor in OBS & GYN and IVF Specialist.', 'The Centre focuses on IVF, Infertility, Genetics, Obstetrics & Gynaecology and is one of the leading fertility centres in the GCC region.', 'It provides highly personalised and specialised treatment for couples as they are assessed on the basis of each medical history. Therefore, it prides itself in its original and innovative approach to each infertility case.', '', '', '', '', '']
Hospital Address: ['St. 11, Hazaa Bin Zayed The First St.', 'Abu Dhabi', '', 'United Arab Emirates']
Team And Speciality:
The medical staff are highly experienced and with international qualifications and many have authored books and published their articles in international journals. Most of them have more than a decade of experience in their respective fields and can speak at least two languages - English and Arabic.
There are over 20 doctors specialising in the field of Reproductive Endocrinology and Infertility, Obstetrics & Gynaecology, Urology, Anaesthesia, Reproductive Medicine, and Reproductive Genetics. 
Noted among the experts is Dr Ali Hellani, a world-renowned Reproductive Geneticist having 15 years of experience and particularly famous for being the first and only scientist to perform PGD on single-gene disorders with direct HLA matching.
More Details
Infrastructure: ["The Centre enables international patients to start their fertility treatment through a partial treatment at their home country after consulting the Centre's medical experts and then visit the Centre for procedures later. ", 'The Centre has sophisticated and innovative technologies and techniques like EmbryoScope, Assisted Hatching, Blastocyst Transfer, Intra-Cytoplastic Morphologically-selected Sperm Injection (IMSI).']
Location:
The Centre is ideally situated in Al Manhal, a prime location that is close to hotels, shopping malls, supermarkets and leisure palces.
The Abu Dhabi International Airport is 30 minutes away from the Centre.
There are many hotels within a range of 4 km. Hotel prices start from USD 37.00 - 170.00. Else, there are service apartments/accommodations and guest houses to choose from.
Taxi services, limousine and car rentals are also available.
There are many pharmacies within a 5 minute drive and many restaurants are also nearby within a 5 - 10 minute drive.

Name: Fakih IVF Fertility Centre, Dubai
About Hospital: ['Birthed from the vision of Dr Micheal Fakih, a well-known, award-winning, and respected Obs&Gyn and IVF Specialist, the Fakih IVF Fertility Centre established its first-ever centre in Dubai in 2011. ', 'It is a leading Fertility, IVF, Obstetrics & Gynaecology, and Genetics in the GCC region.', 'It offers highly specialised and personalised treatment as each couple is assessed according to their medical history.', '', '', '', '', '']
Team And Speciality:
The medical experts in the Centre are well accomplished with international qualifications and many have authored and published their articles in international journals. They are from varied cultural backgrounds; most of them are multi-lingual with English and Arabic as the two common languages spoken.
There are over 20 doctors specialising in Obs & Gyn, Infertility, Reproductive Endocrinology, Reproductive Medicine, Urology, Genetics, Anaesthesia along with an Embryologist and Clinical Dietician.
Amongt the specialist is Dr Ali Hellani, a world renowned Reproductive Geneticist who is the first and only scientist to perform PGD on single gene disorders with direct HLA matching.
More Details
Infrastructure: ['The Centre was the first to have EmbryoScope, a breakthrough technology in reproductive medicine. It is a revolutionary incubator with in-built camera that captures embryos as it grows.', 'It has a modern IVF technology called Intra-Cytoplasmic Morphologically-Selected Sperm Injection (IMSI) that enables magnifying of sperms 6000 times against the standard 400 times. This paves way for selecting the best criteria sperm to have a successful fertility treatment. ']
Location:
Fakih IVF Fertility Centre is located in the upscale area of Dubai. 
The Dubai International Airport is about 17 minutes away.
The nearest subway station is the Financial Centre Station that is 7 minutes by car and the nearest bus stop is the Mercato Shopping Mall which is a 3 minute drive.
There are many hotels within a radius of 5 km. Hotel price starts from USD 66 - 270 per night approximately. Alternately, serviced apartments/accommodations are also available.
There are many pharmacies within a 5 minute drive.
There are several fancy restaurants offering international cuisines at a walking distance.
Taxi services and car rentals are aplenty for sightseeing and shopping.

Location:
Istanbul Florence Nightingale Hospital
Istanbul Florence Nightingale Hospital is a 18-storeyed building with a heliport on its rooftop for air ambulance helicopters enclosed in an area of 50,254 square meters. 
The hospital complex holds a capacity of 219 patient beds, 51 intensive care unit beds, 11 operating rooms equipped with laminar airflow, HEPA filtered ventilation systems and 2 delivery rooms. The hospital is equipped with the latest technology, including EOS device that minimizes the effect of radiation by using low dosage 2D/3D X-ray radiation in Orthopedic imaging. The device gives clear frontal and lateral view in a digital form as well as 3D display of the skeletal anatomy. 
The hospital has ‘Centers of Excellence’ including IVF, Istanbul Spine Surgery Center, Physical Therapy & Rehabilitation Center, Breast Health Center, Dermacosmetology Center, Reflux Center, Check-up Center and Istanbul Minimally Invasive & Robotic Surgery Center. 
  Sisli Florence Nightingale Hospital
Sisli Florence Nightingale Hospital has 12 surgery rooms and 300 beds in an indoor area of 35,000 square meters. The hospital was inaugurated in 1989 with Cardiology and Cardiovascular Surgery as its main departments. Today, it offers medical services in other departments such as Nephrology, Neurology, Interventional Radiology, Robotic Surgery, ENT, etc. The Emergency department provides 24/7 service. 
The hospital stands out shine for performing Minimally Invasive, complex Orthopedic, General Surgery and other heart procedures. 
  Gayrettepe Florence Nightingale Hospital
The hospital complex has 102 rooms, divided into different types, ensuring patients’ comfort and ease during their stay. The hospital is a well-known brand among the best healthcare hospitals, characterized based on medical experts, technological intelligence, advanced diagnostic and treatment techniques. 
The Radiology department is equipped with the advanced, latest equipment, such as MRI, 2*64 multi-slice computerized tomography, PET-CT, PET-MRI, etc., and share all reports and images via the ‘Picture Archiving and Communication System’ (PACS) technology. 
Gayrettepe Florence Nightingale Hospital has six Centers of Excellence, including Comprehensive Cancer Center, Plastic & Reconstructive Center, Gynecology & IVF Center, Istanbul Center for Robotic Surgery, Urology Center and PET-MRI, PET-CT, Gamma Knife.

Name: Gangnam Severance Hospital- Yonsei University
About Hospital: ['Gangnam Severance Hospital was established in 1983 to expand the medical project of the Yonsei University Medical Center. It is a luxury hospital in the area of Gangnam, Seoul with state-of-the-art medico-surgical equipment and advanced research. ', "It is a multi-hospital consisting of Cardiocerebrovascular Hospital, Cancer Hospital, Spine Hospital, and Dental Hospital. The Gangnam Severance Cancer Hospital that was started in 1996 provides cancer treatment based on the best medical services to become a 'global luxury hospital.' ", 'It is the first trauma treatment centre in Seoul. ', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
Medical Departments: ['CARDIOLOGY AND CARDIAC SURGERY (12)', 'COSMETIC AND PLASTIC SURGERY (3)', 'GASTROENTEROLOGY (17)', 'GYNECOLOGY (3)', 'HEMATOLOGY (1)', 'HEPATOLOGY (7)', 'IVF and INFERTILITY (1)', 'NEUROLOGY AND NEUROSURGERY (15)', 'ONCOLOGY AND ONCOSURGERY (4)', 'ORTHOPEDICS (10)', 'TRANSPLANT SURGERY (3)']
Team And Speciality:
When it comes to treatment, the Gangnam Severance Hospital uses the 'multidisciplinary treatment system', in which relating clinical departments treat together with the best customised plan for the patient. With its ultra-modern surgical equipment, the Hospital is leading the way to cure cancer diseases.
Moreover, with a holistic approach to heal cancer, the Hospital not only treats but also provides rehabilitation and cancer prevention through diet management, cooking-training classes for cancer patients, a 'rest of mind' program for patients and their families, and health lectures for the general public.  
At the Cardiocerebrovascular Hospital, each centre has a medical staff for emergency patients, and a professional medical team is formed to quickly treat aortic dissection and aortic aneurysm.

Infrastructure: ['Gangnam Severance Hospital was a medical wasteland that was turned into a luxury hospital with a high customer satisfaction.', 'A robot surgery, the latest medical equipment such as VERSA-HD, a lump sum card payment system for medical expenses, and a 24-hour telephone reservation, and consultation system are available for the first time in Korea.', 'The Gangnam Severance Cardiocerebrovascular Hospital has four specialised centres - heart centre, cerebrovascular centre, aortic blood vessel centre, and rehabilitation prevention centre.', '', '', '']

Gangnam Severance Hospital is located in the upscale, modern, high-rise building area of Seoul.
The Hospital is well connected by public transportation. In addition, there are hospital shuttle buses that could be taken from different subways, railroads, and bus terminals.  
From the Incheon International Airport and the Gimpo International Airport, a limousine bus could be taken. It is also possible to take the subway from the Gimpo International Airport.
A UNESCO heritage site - Joseon Royal Tombs or the 1st World Taekwondo Championships Monument are just nearby the Hospital. 
Many eateries, banks, and ATMs are also close to the Hospital.

The hospital has a team of specialist oncologists in various departments, like medical oncology, surgical oncology, and radiation oncology, along with a team of experienced clinicians, to treat patients with different kinds of cancer. 
The surgical Oncology team is equipped with all the latest technologies to perform surgeries like head & neck resections, breast cancer surgeries including conservative breast surgery, modified radical mastectomy and breast reconstructive procedures.
The surgical department at HCG Cancer Centre also performs procedures like gastrointestinal cancer surgeries including sphincter preserving surgeries and colostomy for rectal cancer, a full-range of gynaec oncology procedures and supportive oncology surgeries like venous access and chemoport placement. FNAC - Fine Needle Aspiration Cytology - and biopsies are also used for swift diagnosis.

SBRT (Stereotactic Body Radiation Therapy) and RapidArc are equipped to manage even the most complex cancers.', 'The SBRT approach enables delivery of high precision radiation therapy and uses multiple imaging modalities.', 'The OT complex is equipped with three major and one minor operation theatres that have state-of-the-art equipment and technology to perform complex surgeries.', 'The HCG Cancer Centre also has a daycare facility to cater to outpatients. Name: Inha University Hospital
About Hospital: ['The Inha University Hospital was opened in May 1996, the first university hospital in the greater Incheon area. It also has a Health Promotion Centre specialising in an overall health check-up.', 'The Clinical departments include Allergic Medicine, Cardiology, Clinical Pathology, Dentistry, Dermatology, Endocrinology and Metabolism, Gastroenterology, Infection Medicine, Nephrology, Neurosurgery, Paediatrics, Obstetrics and Gynaecology, Nuclear Medicine, Opthalmology, ENT, Orthopaedic Surgery, Plastic Surgery, Psychiatry, Rehabilitation Medicine, Thoracic and Cardiovascular Surgery, and Urology to mention a few.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

Team And Speciality:
The Hospital has special Centres namely, the Cancer Centre comprising of 4 special centres - Cyberknife Centre, Woman’s Cancer Centre, Cancer & BMT, and Lung Cancer Centre, the Cardiocerebrovascular Disease Centre, and Spinal Center and Rheumatism Centre. 
Other Centres are the Breast and Thyroid Surgery Centre, Cranial Nerve Centre, Comprehensive Cancer Centre, Digestive Care Centre, Emergency Medical Centre, Head and Neck Cancer Centre, Obesity Centre, Organ Transplantation Centre, Pain Management Centre, Palliative Care Centre, Rare Diseases Centre, Robotic Surgery Centre, and the Diabetes Endocrinology Centre.

It also has the Vital beam, a high-end radioactive cancer treatment equipment that enables a faster, safer, and more precise X-ray than conventional ones.', 'The Inha University Hospital uses electronic medical records and Full PACS for the first time in Korea.']

Ideally located near the Incheon International Airport, the Inha University Hospital can be reached easily by bus, subway, or by car. Information can be accessed from the website https://www.inha.com/en/page/info/contact
There are many restaurants, cafes, and shopping malls nearby.
The nearest tourist destination is the Snowflake village, a historical place called HongYe-mun is also closeby. On the north western side of the Hospital lies the Wolmi Amusement Park.

Three clinics are located at Lake Constance near the Swiss Alps; the metropolitan area of Zurich is just a few kilometers away.
There are numerous tourist places to visit nearby, e.g., the flower island of Mainau, the Zeppelin Museum in Friedrichshafen, the World Cultural Heritage of the island of Reichenau, and many more.
The clinic in Heidelberg is located in one of the oldest university cities of Europe and the old quarter of Heidelberg with its famous castle attracts many people from all over the world.
In Stuttgart, the Clinic is located near a nature reserve. Apart from this, there are many art museums and the pulsating life of a German metropolis that offer many opportunities to spend one’s leisure time.
Lake Constance is the perfect place for water sports, close to the clinic sites and Golfers from all over the world meet at excellent golf courses where they can easily reach from the clinic sites.
The clinic's International office provides information about all the activities, tourist places, and can also arrange preferred activities of the guests with the local tourist information offices.
They also provide pickup service from Stuttgart or Zurich airport (Allensbach) and from Frankfurt am Main (Heidelberg).
There are many offers for accompanying persons such as massage, swimming pool, excursions, etc.

Name: Konkuk University Medical Centre
About Hospital: ['Founded in 1931, the new Konkuk University Medical Centre (KUMC) was opened in August 2005. With a mission to promote a healthy community, it prides itself in its "high-quality care, education, and research."', 'Being a multispeciality Hospital, it has 31 Clinical departments and 23 Centres. It excels in the treatment of cardiovascular diseases. In fact, in 2019, it received an award from the Minister of Health and Welfare for its merit on the acute cardioplegia examination. It also received a first rating on its assessment of breast and stomach cancers. The Stroke Centre also obtained a certification from the Korean Stroke Society.', "It has an International Health Centre with staff fluent in English, Russian, and Chinese. It also has a Health Centre with cutting-edge medical devices and personalised packages suited for the patient's lifestyle.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
Medical Departments: ['CARDIOLOGY AND CARDIAC SURGERY (4)', 'COSMETIC AND PLASTIC SURGERY (4)', 'GASTROENTEROLOGY (2)', 'GENERAL SURGERY (12)', 'HEPATOLOGY (2)', 'NEUROLOGY AND NEUROSURGERY (7)', 'OBESITY OR BARIATRIC SURGERY (12)', 'ORTHOPEDICS (8)', 'SPINE SURGERY (2)']
Team And Speciality: Having the Da Vinci Xi system, the Department of Surgery, Department of Urology, Department of Obstetrics and Gynaecology,  Department of Otorhinolaryngology - Head and Neck Surgery, and Department of Thoracic Surgery provide the highest success rate and safest robotic-assisted surgery having a better image and enabling easier operation through its cutting-edge technology.
Top Doctors: ['Prof. Yang Jung-Hyun', 'Prof. Shin Je-Kyoun', 'Prof. Lee Hong-Ghi', 'Prof. Moon Chang-Taek']
Infrastructure: ['KUMC has a building made up of 4 basements and 12 floors. 9 floors are reserved as Wards with the top floor being a high-end luxury VIP Ward.', 'The building consists of religious rooms, an Auditorium, Funeral Hall, Piano Lounge, and other facilities. It has an Information Desk for enquries. ', 'The Hospital has 9 medical equipment such as Da Vinci Xi, Angiography System, Mammography System, PET-CT, Mobile Digital Radiography etc.']
Location:
It is located near the Han river in the city of Seoul. 
It can be easily reached by public transportation such as the subway, the blue and green bus. From the Incheon International Airport, either the subway or an airport limousine service can be taken. From the Gimpo Airport, a subway can also be taken in which the subway station Exit 3 leads directly to the Hospital lobby. More information can be found on https://www.kuh.ac.kr/english/guide/directions.do
There are many pharmacies, eateries, hotels, and tourist attractions nearby. In fact, the Star City Mall, the Lotte Department Store, and the Classic 500 are just across the street.

Name: KPJ Ampang Puteri Specialist Hospital, Ampang
About Hospital: ['KPJ Ampang Puteri Specialist Hospital is a premier hospital that is owned by the KPJ Healthcare Group, one of the leading providers of private healthcare in Malaysia.', 'It is a multispecialty hospital that offers 25 medical and surgical procedures including Cardiology & Cardiothoracic, Breast & Endocrine, Neurology/Neurosurgery, Interventional Radiology, Radiotherapy & Oncology, Orthopaedic Surgery, Plastic & Reconstructive Surgery, Obesity/Bariatric Surgery, Obstetrics & Gynaecology, and Paediatrics.', 'The Hospital is the first in Malaysia to receive full accreditation status by the Malaysian Society for Quality in Health (MSQH) for the 6th consecutive 4-year term 2016-2020.', '', '', '', '', '']
Medical Departments: ['CARDIOLOGY AND CARDIAC SURGERY (1)', 'COSMETIC AND PLASTIC SURGERY (1)', 'GASTROENTEROLOGY (1)', 'GYNECOLOGY (1)', 'HEPATOLOGY (1)', 'ORTHOPEDICS (3)', 'PEDIATRICS AND PEDIATRIC SURGERY (1)']
Hospital Address: ['1, Jln Mamanda 9, Taman Dato Ahmad Razali,', 'Kuala Lumpur', '68000', 'Malaysia']
Team And Speciality:
The Hospital has more than 80 resident, sessional, and visiting medical consultants who are well-qualified and experienced in their respective fields.
The Medical, Consultants, Nurses, and Paramedics are carefully selected on the basis of their professional expertise and commitment to deliver personalized service to patients.
Top Doctors: ['Dato Dr. Mohd Hamzah bin Kamarulzaman', "Dato' Dr. Abd. Jalil Jidon", "Dato' Dr. Abdul Wahab Abdul Ghani", "Dato' Dr. Abdul Halim Abdul Jalil"]
Infrastructure: ['It is built on a 5.35-acres land with a total built-up area of 330,000 square feet.', 'It has more than 200 beds with a choice of rooms suited for all types of budgets.', 'It has a 24/7 Emergency Services, Pharmacy, and Cafe.', '', '']
Location:
KPJ Ampang is located at Ampang, outside the eastern side of Kuala Lumpur; it can be easily reached from Kuala Lumpur and Selangor, a bustling commercial state in Malaysia.
The Hospital is about an hour away from the Kuala Lumpur International Airport.
There are many 2-3 star hotels nearby; hotel prices start from USD 15 per night. Additionally, there are budget accommodations as well.
To commute, there are buses that stop at the Ampang Point station which is a walking distance to and from the Hospital. There are also taxi services nearby.
Restaurants offering different cuisines and cafes can be found within less than 1 km.

Name: La Clinique Mediterraneenne, Tunis
About Hospital: ['Established in 2007, the La Clinique Mediterraneenne, Tunis is a multidisciplinary hospital located in Tunisia.', 'The hospital specializes in the entire health structure in terms of services and high-end technology including Orthopedic Surgery, Radiology, Cosmetic surgery, General surgery, 24-hour emergency service, Outpatient surgery, Gynecology & Obstetrics, and many more.', 'The clinic is well-equipped with the latest treatment options and comprises fully-trained doctors and nearly 300 nurses with extensive experience.', '', '', '', '']
Team And Speciality:
La Clinique Mediterraneenne offers a multitude of services in various departments such as Radiology, Cosmetic surgery, General surgery, Orthopedic surgery, 24-hour emergency service, Outpatient surgery, Urology medical and surgical center, Digestive endoscopy, PMA Pediatrics, Gynecology, and obstetrics.
The clinic is one of the last private clinics in Tunisia and it is a 100% digitalized clinic with a complete health structure in terms of specialties, services, and technologies.
The patient file at the clinic is computerized and secure to ensure complete medical professional secrecy and patients' personal data.
More Details
Infrastructure: ['La Clinique Mediterraneenne located in Tunis is a multidisciplinary clinic with an inpatient capacity of 120 beds and is designed to be a comprehensive health structure in terms of specialties, technology, and service. ', 'The clinic is furnished with an ultra-modern operating theater, several operating theaters, and a resuscitation unit.', 'It is a 100% digital clinic with 35 specialties and 85 connected machines.', '']
Location:
La Clinique Mediterraneenne, Tunis
37 Avenue de l'UMA, Tunis, Tunisia
The hospital is at a distance of 3.9 km via Tunis Carthage International Airport. The drive takes about 5 minutes. Taxis and shuttles are easily available from the airport to the hospital.
The closest subway stations are Ariana and L'indépendance.
Various hotels, restaurants, ATMs, and pharmacies are available near the hospital.

Name: La Midas, Gurgaon
About Hospital: ['La Midas, Gurgaon is a leading and state-of-the-art centre for holistic medical, aesthetic and cosmetic treatments. The multi-speciality, cosmetic centre provides quality services at par with international standards was set up in June 2021.', 'La Midas,Gurgaon is a perfect union of vast experience in surgical, non-surgical and advanced technology to offer the best in aesthetic treatments.', 'The single-storey cosmetic centre is spread across 24,000 sq. ft and has consulting and counselling rooms.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
Team And Speciality:
La Midas, Gurgaon is a multi-speciality, cosmetic-cum-wellness and healthcare facility that opened to the public in June 2021. The centre is a leading destination for cosmetic surgery, cosmetology, diet management, dermatology, acupuncture, Ayurveda, naturopathy, PT, obstetrics & gynaecology, PCO, pathology, radiology, urology, wellness, endocrinology, hair transplant, IV therapy, IVF and menopause. Its popular treatments are, Miami Diamond Dermal Infusion, Insta Glow Booster, La Midas miracle infusion, Forever Young Therapy, Unlimited Hair Transplant and Collagen Induction Therapy.
The medical team at La Midas, Gurgaon comprises of specialised and skilled medical professionals such as consultants, surgeons and counsellors.
Location:
The distance between Indira Gandhi International Airport, New Delhi and La Midas, Gurgaon is about 20 minutes by private car or a hired cab. The cosmetic-cum-wellness centre is 12 km away from the international airport.
The other options are the Magenta and Yellow Lines of the Delhi Metro, which can take up to an hour and 40 minutes.
The vicinity of the hospital has many dine out options and stay options ranging from budget to semi-luxury accomodation.

About Hospital: ['La Rose Clinic, Tunis is a private multidisciplinary clinic located in Jardins du Lac and established in the year 2017.', 'It is the first clinic in Tunisia and Africa to sign an agreement with Accreditation Canada.', 'As one of the first accreditor of French-speaking and English-speaking healthcare establishments in the world, Accreditation Canada aims to work with patients, providers, and politicians to improve the quality of healthcare services and social services for all.', '', '', '', '', '']

The clinic has an updated medico-technical platform that is equipped with the most efficient diagnostic and treatment tools, allowing the best working conditions for all patients.
Hospital specialty includes surgery, gynecology, radiology, assisted reproduction, aesthetics as well as emergencies.
More Details

Name: Lifecare Hospital, Musaffah
About Hospital: ['Lifecare Hospital at Musaffah in Abu Dhabi is an accredited hospital that provides cost-effective healthcare services without compromising quality medical and surgical care.', 'It is a multispecialty hospital with 21 Departments offering Cardiology, Pulmonology, Dermatology, Neurology and Neurosciences, Ophthalmology, Orthopaedics, Gastroenterology etc.', 'It is a customer centric hospital that gives personalised care with dedicated physicians and medical staff to meet the growing needs of the people in UAE.', '', '', '']

It provides Occupational Health Medical Check-up Packages with treatments if needed, such as Aviation Health Check-up, Food Handler and Catering Health Check-up, Oil and Gas Health Check-up etc.
The physicians from different parts of the world are well qualified with rich experiences in their respective fields. They speak at least two languages - English and a local language.
All the Emergency Department nurses are ACLS certified.
Infrastructure: ['The Medical and Surgical Departments are well furnished with ultramodern facilities and technologies like Cath Lab with the latest version of biplane cardiac catheterization machine, PACS/RIS system, MRI with 1.5T machines and anClosed, CT machines with 320 slice VCT-XT.', 'The Radiology and Imaging Department also has Interventional Radiology that allows images to be accessed to the doctor in the same hospital or another. It also has Bone Densitometry, Mammography, Fluroscopy etc.', 'It has 200 number of beds and a list of categories to choose from depending on requirements.', '', '', '']
Location:
Lifecare Hospital, Musaffah is situated in the south west industrial area of Abu Dhabi.
It is about 35 minutes away from the Abu Dhabi International Airport.
Hotels are found mostly in the heart of the city. Nearby hotels are Gravity Hotel, L'Arabia Hotel Apartments, Traders Hotel etc. The price range is approximately from USD 50 - 140.00 per night.
Many guest houses are available within a 17 minute drive towards the southern part of the Hospital.
Many pharmacies can be found within a radius of 2 km. Many delectable restaurants are also nearby.
Emirates Taxi, National Taxi LLC, and many car rental agencies are available nearby.

Name: Ludwig Maximilian University Hospital, Munich
About Hospital: ['The LMU Klinikum, known as Klinikum der Universität München until 2020 is the merged hospital complex of the Ludwig Maximilian University of Munich.', 'The hospital is one of the leading research universities in Europe, with a more than 500-year-long tradition, and is committed to the highest international standards of excellence in research and teaching.', 'With the outpatient care facilities, more than 2,000 beds are available for partial and complete inpatient treatment along with 1,700 doctors and 3,200 nurses sourced from over 90 countries to care for the patients well.', '', '', '', '']
Medical Departments: ['CARDIOLOGY AND CARDIAC SURGERY (3)', 'COSMETIC AND PLASTIC SURGERY (1)', 'GYNECOLOGY (1)', 'IVF and INFERTILITY (1)', 'NEUROLOGY AND NEUROSURGERY (3)', 'ONCOLOGY AND ONCOSURGERY (2)', 'ORTHOPEDICS (2)', 'PEDIATRIC CARDIOLOGY (1)', 'PEDIATRICS AND PEDIATRIC SURGERY (3)']

More than 9,500 employees are associated with the hospital, around 1,700 are doctors and 3,200 are nursing staff.
It provides outstanding services through its departments, including medical transplant surgery, vascular surgery, reconstructive surgery, cardiac surgery, pediatric surgery, cardiology, hematology, oncology, hematology, endocrinology, neurology, and orthopedics.
The general, abdominal, and transplant surgery department is listed among the best departments in the country for bowel cancer treatment.
