Location:
The largest group hospital in Turkey, Medical Park Hospitals Group, which got into the act of the Turkish business hospital in 1993, provides healthcare services in 28 hospitals across 17 cities.
Istinye University Bahcesehir Liv Hospital
Academic approach of Istinye University, when combined with patient-oriented service approach of Liv Hospital, makes Istinye University Bahcesehir Liv Hospital. With an aim to achieve ‘excellence’ in healthcare services, it holds a perfect combination of dedicated physicians and modern infrastructure. 
The hospital started operating in December 2016 catering tertiary care services in all departments, including Transplantation Center, Vascular Health Center, Medical Oncology, Oncologic Surgeries, and more. It is a 21-storeyed hospital covering an indoor area of 62,500 square meters, equipped with smart, latest technology for treatments. The hospital provides 5-star hotel comfort to all the patients and relatives. The lounge has a Cafe, where visitors enjoy amiable service. 
  Istinye University Medical Park Gaziosmanpasa Hospital
With its services since 2015, the hospital continues to serve patients in a capacity of 197 in-patient beds and 15 operating theaters covering an indoor space of 67,000 square meters. 
Due to innovative technologies and advanced treatment, the hospital is able to make a distinguished name in every field from infrastructure to medical staff to academic title. The hospital strives to deliver healthcare services meeting the highest standards in all departments and is especially known for the management and treatment of chronic diseases, such as heart disease, diabetes, obesity, hypertension and cancer. 
  I.A.U VM Medical Park Florya Hospital
The hospital started its operations in March 2017 which houses regional healthcare academic professionals, technological infrastructure and dedicated specialists. Being the first hospital introduced under ‘Value Added Medicine’ (VM) in Istanbul, the hospital excels in providing healthcare services with its patient-oriented approach, expert staff and advanced technology. 
The hospital holds a capacity of 300 beds, 13 operating theaters, and 92 outpatient clinics with in area of 51,000 square meters. As it is a university hospital housing all medical and surgical branches, it prioritize patient comfort and pioneers in all departments, such as oncology, bariatric surgery, gynecology, etc. meeting international quality. 
  BAU Medical Park Goztepe Hospital
BAU Medical Park Goztepe Hospital complex is a Joint Commission International accredited Hospital which holds a capacity of 293 beds, 9 operating theaters, 64 intensive care beds under the supervision of 150+ doctors and 1,000 employees. 
It is the first cancer hospital owned in Turkey, equipped with advanced diagnosis and treatment units, such as PET-CT and Linear Accelerator device. Patients receive anti-cancer treatment in all kinds of required departments including Medical Oncology, Cancer Surgery, Radiation Oncology, Genetics, Psychology, etc. The hospital also has a well-known Dental Department with qualified dentists who are well-versed with a full spectrum of dental services from tooth whitening to implant. 
  Altınbaş University Medical Park Bahçelievler Hospital 
Starting its operations since 2007, the hospital complex provides healthcare services meeting international standards, pioneers in bone marrow transplantation, performs cardiac surgeries using minimally invasive surgery techniques, handles pediatric services, and is amongst the limited Neurostimulator centers! 
The healthcare services follows 360-degree service approach giving 5-star hotel comfort to the patients. Services like Wi-Fi access, ATM, parking lot are available for patients and relatives. 
  VM Medical Park Pendik Hospital
The hospital complex spreads over 62 thousand square meters, holds a capacity of 400 beds, 10 operating theaters, and 63 intensive care unit beds under the supervision of 100+ physicians. It renders healthcare services in 57 departments ranging from neurology to cardiology, orthopedics to gynecology. 
The hospital offers the ‘Liv Concept’ service in 19 outpatient clinics, where highly-qualified physicians use the advanced medical treatment for successful outcomes. 
  VM Medical Park Kocaeli Hospital
This hospital is being the largest privately owned hospital in Kocaeli, adopts patient-oriented superior service approach with advanced diagnostic and therapeutic modalities. With an indoor area of 48 thousand square meters, this hospital has 101 outpatient clinics, 10 operating rooms, and 151 beds. 
VM Medical Park Kocaeli Hospital brings a new face in the healthcare field with advanced, cutting-edge techniques and well-experienced physicians. 
  Medical Park Silivri Hospital
Medical Park Group of Hospitals has extended its qualitative healthcare services to Silivri. The hospital spreads in an area of 12,230 square meters with 45+ doctors and dedicated nursing staff. 
Being equipped with the latest, cutting-edge techniques, the hospital has 115 patient beds, 37 intensive care unit beds, 21 General Intensive care beds, 6 Neonatal Intensive care beds and 10 coronary intensive care beds. The hospital complex renders medical services in 17 departments in a capacity of 32 outpatient clinics and 4 operating theaters.
  Medical Park Ankara Hospital
Medical Park Ankara Hospital follows patient-oriented service approach with advanced diagnostic and therapeutic modalities that prioritizes their policy ‘Health for Everybody’. 
The hospital offers qualitative medical services in an area of 22 thousand square meters, 158 beds, 52 intensive care beds, 6 operating theaters and 80 outpatient clinics. The hospital complex also follows the ‘VM concept’ based on healthcare services meeting the demands of guests in terms of quality and quantity. 
  VM Medical Park Mersin Hospital
Adopting the ‘VM concept’, VM Medical Park Mersin Hospital provides healthcare services in many departments such as interventional radiology, gynecology, bariatric surgery, metabolic surgery, pediatric surgery, etc. to patients in Turkey and across the globe. 
The hospital complex provides flawless services giving 5-star hotel comfort to patients and family members. Some of the rooms have exclusive services, such as television, Wi-Fi access and personalized menu. Prayer rooms, parking lot, valet services are some of the specialized services offered. 
  VM Medical Park Bursa Hospital
Named after the slogan ‘Value Added Medicine’, the hospital spreads in an area of 55,000 square meters with a capacity of 270 beds, 10 operating theaters, and 83 intensive beds. The hospital offers heliport services for emergency cases and transfers
The hospital is known for providing flawless service enabling 5-star hotel comfort. Some of the exclusive services provided are television, internet access, specialized diet menu, newspaper-magazine services. One of the features of this hospital is world-class service approach of LIV (Leading International Vision) hospital using advanced diagnostic and therapeutic methods. 
  Medical Park Izmir Hospital 
Being the largest private hospital of Aegean region, the hospital complex houses a wide range of Oncology services due to availability of advanced, cutting-edge devices, such as PET-CT, Gamma-Knife technology and LINAC devices. 
Covering an area of 46,000 square meters, the hospital holds a capacity of 301 beds, 88 intensive care beds, including 29 Internal-Surgical Intensive care beds, 7 Cardiovascular Intensive Care beds, 7 Coronary Intensive Care beds, and 35 Incubators for Neonatal Intensive Care unit. This hospital is well-known for various departments, such as Oncology, Bone Marrow Transplantation, Organ Transplantation and Microsurgery.  
  Medical Park Gaziantep Hospital
This healthcare facility is built on an indoor area of 30,000 square meters serving in 34 different departments, including Internal Medicine, Surgery, Diagnostics, and Rehabilitation departments. 
Since its opening in 2008, the hospital caters medical services using advanced, cutting-edge equipment, technological intelligence under the supervision of medical personnel. The complex comprises 9 operating theaters equipped with Laminar Flow and HEPA filtered sterile ventilation systems. The hospital is well-known for performing successful oncologic surgeries. 
The hospital has specialized Oncology center, where physicians perform operations meeting international standards in several fields, such as Oncologic surgery, Radiation Oncology, medical surgery and oncologic rehabilitation. 
Rheumatology department is one of the departments which is not available in any other private hospital, is put into service over here. It has experienced physicians who treat several diseases such as Osteoporosis, Gout, Lupus disease, Vasculitis, etc. 
  VM Medical Park Samsun Hospital
VM Medical Park Samsun Hospital is the only private hospital that has an entire floor for Adult, Neonatal and Coronary Intensive Care Units. The hospital performs 250+ angiographies and 50+ open heart surgeries every month. The complex has fully-fledged angiography laboratory aside from neurology, radiology and nuclear medicine departments. Additionally, there are 8 operating theaters equipped with special instruments for cardiovascular surgery providing 24/7 healthcare service to the patients. 
  Medical Park Yildiz Hospital
Being the twenty-eighth hospital of Medical Park chain, this hospital excels in offering healthcare services in an indoor area of 12,000 square meters, including 107 beds, 17 ICU beds, 12 Neonatal ICU beds, 6 operating theaters implemented by 45 physicians and 350 nursing personnel.
  Medical Park Karadeniz Hospital
Spread over 8,000 square meters, this hospital serves healthcare services in a capacity of 87 patient beds, 26 intensive care beds, 2 operating rooms run by 40 doctors and 332 personnel.
The hospital specializes in several departments such as Cardiology, Neurology, Gynecology, General Surgery, and more. The hospital is designed with a 24/7 cafeteria for patients and their relatives.
  Medical Park Ordu Hospital
Being the 13th hospital of the Medical Park chain, this hospital has been providing qualitative, budget-friendly medical services in the Black Sea region since it has started operating. The complex comprises 47 intensive care beds, 19 general intensive care unit beds, 10 coronary intensive care unit, 12 neonatal intensive care unit, and 206 inpatient beds. 
It serves healthcare services in all branches including Cardiology, Cardiovascular surgery, Gastroenterology, Medical Oncology, Psychiatry. The hospital premises is equipped with the advanced digital imaging modalities, magnetic resonance imaging, X-ray, computerized tomography, mammography, bone densitometry, mobile X-ray scanner, ultrasound for diagnostic and treatment processes. 
  Karadeniz Eregli Hospital
Being the first private hospital of Eregli operating since 2007, the complex spreads in an area of 9,000 square meters holding a capacity of 113 beds with a workforce of 226 personnel and 30+ medical professionals. 
The hospital continues to provide healthcare services in several departments. It has Physical and Rehabilitation center, intensive care unit, operation theaters, radiology unit, emergency room and a sleep laboratory. 
  Canakkale Hospital
The hospital started its operations on February 22, 2006. It fulfills healthcare needs under the capacity of two operating theaters, 75 beds run by 186 medical personnel. The hospital provides 24/7 emergency service which admits patients round the clock. The emergency department is equipped with the advanced diagnostic methods supported by healthcare professionals and nursing staff.
The complex has six incubators in Neonatal Intensive Care Unit which provides advanced care to infants with high risks such as premature birth, multiple pregnancies, babies with health problems. The staff closely monitors the patients under the supervision of pediatricians. 
  Medical Park Batman Hospital
The hospital complex spreads in an area of 14,800 square meters and achieved the highest admission of patients across Turkey in 2007 and 2008. The hospital has a workforce of experienced doctors providing healthcare services meeting international standards. It has general and neonatal intensive care units equipped with modern, state-of-the-art technology, sterile operation theaters with Laminar airflow and HEPA filtered ventilation systems.
The hospital is preferred by international hospitals especially Northern Iraq. It has advanced digital imaging techniques including magnetic resonance, computerized tomography, 4D ultrasonography, digital mammography, fluoroscopy, and bone densitometry.
  Medical Park Elazig Hospital
Having a total of 206 inpatient beds along with 79 intensive care beds, 13 operating rooms, 3 delivery rooms, the hospital provides healthcare services at international standards promoting health tourism in the near future. 
The hospital uses high-tech, advanced equipment like 1.5 Tesla  MRI, 128-slice CT, 4D ultrasound and virtual angiography unit. The complex has 66 outpatient clinics in 28 different departments including cardiology, neurology, orthopedics, pediatrics, gynecology, internal medicine, ENT, urology, medical oncology and more.
  Medical Park Tokat Hospital
The hospital conducts its medical activities in an area of 14,000 square meters within a capacity of 100 beds and 6 operating rooms. The hospital is designed with suite rooms and single rooms keeping in mind the socioeconomic status of the patients. 
The hospital holds expertise in several departments including Neurology, Cardiology, Orthopedics, Dermatology, Urology, ENT, Gastroenterology, Nutrition, Dietetics, and Psychology. 
  Medical Park Antalya - “Health for Everybody”!
Medical Park Antalya, the largest private hospital of the Mediterranean region, excels in providing medical services across 33 departments with a capacity of 84 outpatient clinic rooms, 228 inpatient beds and 10 operating theaters, ensuring a convenient location and caring atmosphere for international and domestic patients. 
Crowned with the title ‘Organ Transplantation Center’, more than 600 organ transplants are performed annually. It has been consecutively ranked 1st for the 3rd time for delivering the best transplant services. Patients receive all the required treatment services within the complex and that too without leaving the hospital. 
The hospital complex also has dedicated international patient supervisors who assist in travel, .insurance coordination, visa assistance, accommodation, language translation and interpretation. It has rooms and suites with WiFi, telephone, TV, safe, catering and minibar.
Easily, Accessible Location!
Medical Park Antalya is at a distance of 13.2 Kms from Antalya International Airport. The drive takes about 20 minutes. Taxis or shuttles are easily available from the airport to the hospital. The airport is facilitated with numerous ATMs at all terminals, wide range of bars, cafes, fast-food restaurants & shopping complex including duty-free options, lost & found offices, children’s playground, a well-organized medical staff, four mosques, change rooms and more!

Medical Departments: ['CARDIOLOGY AND CARDIAC SURGERY (27)', 'COSMETIC AND PLASTIC SURGERY (3)', 'DENTAL TREATMENT (1)', 'ENDOCRINOLOGY (4)', 'ENT SURGERY (1)', 'GASTROENTEROLOGY (13)', 'GENERAL SURGERY (7)', 'GYNECOLOGY (2)', 'HEPATOLOGY (3)', 'IVF and INFERTILITY (1)', 'NEPHROLOGY (4)', 'NEUROLOGY AND NEUROSURGERY (32)', 'OBESITY OR BARIATRIC SURGERY (7)', 'ONCOLOGY AND ONCOSURGERY (6)', 'OPTHALMOLOGY (1)', 'ORTHOPEDICS (6)', 'PEDIATRIC CARDIOLOGY (4)', 'PEDIATRICS AND PEDIATRIC SURGERY (4)', 'SPINE SURGERY (1)']
Team And Speciality:
Team: 
The hospital in-houses an advanced cancer treatment center, equipped with high-tech equipment, such as multi-slice CT, PET CT, ultrasonography, LINAC devices, MRI, navigation devices with stereotactic arm, and nuclear medicine imaging methods. The center has experienced cancer specialists who are expert in conducting cancer surgeries, such as the brain, breasts, lungs, etc. 
Medicana Health Group has specialized Oncology departments to treat patients with all kinds of oncological and oncohematologia diseases. These departments have expertise in medical oncology, radiation oncology, chemical medicine and molecular oncology. 
The JCI-accredited hospitals have functional Transplantation units certified by the Turkish Ministry of Health. These units have qualified medical personnel who are expert in performing transplantation surgeries, such as kidney transplant, liver transplant and bone marrow transplant (at Medicana International Ankara Hospital). 
The IVF Fertility Center has experienced fertility specialists, received certification from the prestigious institutes in the EU and the USA. 
Medicana Health Group offers excellent dental services in Medicana Dental Bahçelievler and Medicana Dental Çiftehavuzlar. Medicana dental care centers have a team of a dental personnel who are expert in several dental services, such as implants, bleaching, prosthesis, periodontology, orthodontics, aesthetic dentistry, pedodontist, endodontia, oral, dental and maxillofacial surgery. These dental surgeries are performed under general anesthesia and sedation. 
The clinics offer a full spectrum of surgical and non-surgical cosmetic treatments, including Hair Loss treatment, Abdominoplasty, Breast Augmentation, Facelift, Breast lift, Arm lift, Gynecomastia, Eyelid Surgery, Liposuction, and Rhinoplasty. 
In 2012, the Neurological Sciences, Spine and Orthopedics center introduced under Medicana Health Group. The Neurological Science center has three major units - Epilepsy, Cerebrovascular, and Brain & Spinal Cord Tumors unit. 
The Spine Disease Surgery unit coordinates with the Wooridul Spine Hospital Group in Seoul, South Korea, which is amongst the leading centers to treat spine diseases. The Spine Surgery unit has two major departments - Orthopedics & Traumatology Department and Physical Medicine & Rehabilitation Department.

Medicana Health Group focuses on excellent patient care ensuring patient safety. Supports Pyxis Medication Management System
Medipol University Hospital has adopted the concept of Pyxis Medication Management System which is being the first and largest ‘Drug Management System’. Only a few hospitals in Turkey have adopted Pyxis system, out of which Medipol University Hospital is the one. 
Pyxis Medication Management System works closely with Hospital Information Management System, involves drug delivery from the pharmacy to the patient under full security. The system includes five basic principles of international patient safety which guides right medication to the right patient with the right dose in the right way at the right time.

Top Doctors: ['Prof. Semra KAHRAMAN', 'Dr. Murat Binbay', 'Dr. Mustafa Ozdogan', 'MD Erkan ÖZGÜN']
Location:
Memorial Group covers 10 hospitals, 2 medical centers, and 1 wellness center across Turkey, including Istanbul, Ankara, Antalya, Kayseri, and Diyarbakir. 
Memorial Sisli Hospital
Memorial Sisli Hospital started its operations in February 2000, when they received its first patient. Sisli Hospital delivers qualitative healthcare services in departments, such as Cardiology, Cardiovascular Surgery, IVF, Organ Transplantation and genetics. It is the first JCI (Joint Commission International) accredited hospital in Turkey and 21st in the world. 
The hospital complex has a capacity of 200 beds, 10,000 square parking lot with 300 car capacity, pressure support system for temperature and humidity management, 120 people capacity conference room. 
  Memorial Atasehir Hospital
Memorial Atasehir Hospital started its services in May, 2008. The hospital complex holds a capacity of 143 beds, offers state-of-the-art diagnosis, PACS system, well-equipped operation rooms with laminar airflow system, Radiology Department, General Intensive Care Units, MRA and CT rooms. 
The services provided by the hospital is progressing at a faster rate to the entire region, mainly Atasehir, Kozyatagi and Kucukbakkalkoy. 
  Memorial Ankara Hospital
Being the 10th hospital of the Memorial Group, Memorial Ankara Hospital is one of the largest private hospitals in an indoor area of 42,000 square meters. It has a capacity of 230 beds out of which 60 are intensive care unit beds, MRI and CT rooms equipped with the latest advances and ambience technology for patient comfort, 11 operating rooms, 63 polyclinics, Coronary intensive care unit, General intensive care, CVS intensive care that make it a world-class hospital. 
The hospital complex provides services in all leading departments, such as Cardiovascular Surgery, Invasive Cardiology, Oncology, Organ & Bone Marrow Transplantation, Radiation Oncology and Medical Oncology. The hospital follows a multidisciplinary approach in providing their services to patients, especially to the international patients. 
  Memorial Kayseri Hospital
Memorial Kayseri Hospital fulfills healthcare needs of Central Anatolia region. The hospital is equipped with modern architectural design, comfortable patient rooms, MRI and CT rooms run by qualified medical practitioners and personnel who are well-versed with the latest advances techniques. 
Memorial Kayseri Hospital is the 9th hospital of the Memorial Group. It holds a capacity of 119 patient beds and 5 operating rooms in an indoor area of 11,000 square meters. The PACS system is installed in the hospital complex to provide a filmless clinical environmental results. The hospital has a ‘Kayseri IVF Center’ that provides IVF services meeting ethics and quality standards.

Name: Saint Louis Hospital, Bangkok
About Hospital: ['Saint Louis Hospital in Bangkok is the first Catholic, non-profit hospital established on 15 September 1898 in Thailand.', 'It is a multispecialty hospital with integrated medical and surgical departments like Cosmetic Surgery, Cardiology, Dentistry, Gastroenterology, ENT, Obstetrics & Gynaecology, Orthopaedics, Oncology, Paediatrics, Surgery, Neurology, Nephrology, Pulmonary & Respiratory and many more.', 'It has several important Centres like the Physical Rehabilitation Centre, Accident and Emergency Centre, Dermatology and Skin Laser Centre, Dental Centre, Heart Institute, Orthopaedic Centre, Health Check-up Centre, and Urology Centre.', '', '', '']
Medical Departments: ['CARDIOLOGY AND CARDIAC SURGERY (1)', 'COSMETIC AND PLASTIC SURGERY (1)', 'GASTROENTEROLOGY (1)', 'NEUROLOGY AND NEUROSURGERY (2)', 'ONCOLOGY AND ONCOSURGERY (3)', 'ORTHOPEDICS (14)', 'SPINE SURGERY (2)', 'UROLOGY TREATMENT (2)']
Team And Speciality: Besides providing professional medical facilities and services to patients, the Hospital also has three Centres to maintain its motto of extending mercy to all patients, namely, the Divine Mercy Centre - giving palliative care to patients with less than 6 months life expectancy; the John Paul II Charity Clinic - providing free basic healthcare for patients who are poor and needy; the Holy Spirit Chapel - offering mass and the only place in Thailand to carry out its service in German.
Top Doctors: ['Dr. Kamol Panumatrassamee', 'Dr. Apirak Santingamkun', 'Dr. Boonsert Chatlaong', 'Dr. Pongsiri Piakong']
Infrastructure: ['The Hospital has an ICU, CCU, and NICU rooms.', "There are 500 in-patient beds and has a choice of rooms suitable for one's budget.", 'The Operating rooms are German engineered with being hyper sterilised throughout all operations.', '']
Location:
The Hospital is located in the heart of Bangkok near the Chao Phraya River.
It is 28 minutes from Don Mueang International Airport and 36 minutes from Suvarnabhumi International Airport.
Being centrally located, there are plenty of hotels to choose from. The cheapest hotel rate is about USD 15. There are serviced apartments and hostels as well.
The nearest bus stops right in front of the Hospital; the nearest tram stop is St Louis, BTS Silom Line. Taxi services and Tuktuks are also available to commute.
Restaurants and cafes can be found within a radius of 2 km.

Name: Quironsalud Ophthalmologic Institute, Dubai
About Hospital: ['Quironsalud Ophthalmologic Institute, Dubai is a dedicated single-speciality medical facility set up in 2018 as a leading clinic for all major ophthalmologic ailments.', "The Dubai hospital is Spain's largest healthcare group, Quironsalud Group's foray into the Middle East. The Group has established itself as a comprehensive clinic for eye treatments during the 60 years of its existence and offering treatments across 150+ hospitals in Germany and Spain.   ", 'The hospital is especially renowned for offering Femtosecond technology, throughout the UAE. ', '', '', '', '', '', '']
Hospital Address: ['Villa 1187, 304 Wasl Road,Umm Al Sheif,', 'Dubai', '', 'United Arab Emirates']
Team And Speciality: Quironsalud Ophthalmologic Institute, Dubai is a leading hospital in the UAE that offers advanced ophthalmologic diagnostic services and conducts surgeries too. The team of ophthalmic consultants, surgeons and therapists is highly trained and competent in delivering treatments for all major ophthalmologic sub-specialities. Its prominent diagnostic services are, optical coherence tomography, pachymetry, visual field test, tonometry, digital fluorescein angiography, fluoroscein angiography, CT scan and MRI. Some of the major ophthalmologic procedures performed at the hospital include, surgeries of the cornea, cataracts, Lasik treatments, glaucoma, paediatric ophthalmology, oculoplastic and the retina. The hospital also offers vision therapy and treatment for vision impairment.
Location:
From Dubai International Airport, Quironsalud Ophthalmological Institute is located at a distance of 26 kms and can be reached in maximum 30 mins subject to the route and traffic. Taking a private or hired car is the fastest option to get there. There is a metro service too. 
There are several places to spend time, with the beach being the main and among the closest options. The area around the hospital has great options to eat out too. There are as many stay options around the hospital too.

About Hospital: ['Shalby Hospital, located in Indore, Madhya Pradesh is a leading multi-specialty healthcare institution.', 'The hospital was founded in 1991 by Dr. Vikram I Shah, a renowned orthopedic surgeon, and has since grown to become one of the most respected and sought-after medical centers in the region.', 'It is equipped with state-of-the-art technology and advanced medical equipment and is staffed by a team of highly trained and experienced medical professionals, including doctors, nurses, and support staff.', '', '', '', '']

Team And Speciality:
The hospital's orthopedic team is particularly renowned and is led by Dr. Vikram I Shah, the founder of the hospital and a renowned orthopedic surgeon. 
The center's neurology team is also highly skilled and experienced and is equipped to handle a wide range of neurological conditions, including stroke, epilepsy, and neurodegenerative diseases.
It has a team of cardiologists well-versed in the latest diagnostic and treatment techniques for heart disease and offers a wide range of services including angiography, angioplasty, and bypass surgery.
More Details
Infrastructure: ['The hospital has a capacity of 500 beds and is designed to provide comfortable and efficient care to patients.', 'The infrastructure includes a wide range of facilities and services, including 24-hour emergency services, Inpatient and outpatient services, Diagnostic services, such as X-rays, CT scans, and MRI and Intensive care units, including ICU, NICU, and PICU.', 'It also has Operating rooms equipped with advanced surgical technology, Rehabilitation and physiotherapy services, Labs for Blood tests and other diagnostic tests.', '', '']

About Hospital: ['Sachsenhausen Hospital was established in the year 1968 in Frankfurt, Germany; however, it has a rich history of 125 years where Prof. Dr. Carl von Noorden, a world-renowned expert in metabolic diseases, and Dr. Eduard Lampe founded the first diabetes clinic by the name of Sachsenhausen and grew it from there.', 'In April 2016, the hospital was certified by the ISO: 9001 certifications as it maintained the quality standards of the highest medical requirements.', 'Moreover, the departments of diabetology, cardiology, obesity treatment, and a sleep research laboratory in the hospital were awarded additional certificates of professional societies. ', '', '', '']

Team And Speciality:
Sachsenhausen Hospital is one of the best medical facilities in Europe in bariatric, general, and abdominal surgery. 
The hospital staff is well-proficient in treating an entire range of gynecological diseases using laparoscopy and hysteroscopy using high-tech X-ray equipment, CT, MRI, high-resolution endoscopy, etc.
More than 1,300 children are born per year in the maternity department and it specializes in pre-and postnatal osteopathy, birth preparation courses, acupuncture, mental training, and preparing hypnosis for childbirth.
More Details
Top Doctors: ['Prof. Dr. med. Plamen Staikov', 'Dr. Jurgen Stein', 'Dr. med. Holger Bahn', 'Prof. Dr. med. Claudius Teupe']

Schulstraße 31, 60594 Frankfurt am Main

Restaurants, ATMs, pharmacies, and hotels are all available near the hospital.

Name: Yeungnam University Medical Center
About Hospital: ['Established in 1983, the Yeungnam University Medical Centre (YUMC) is located in the southeastern part of South Korea aiming to provide the best medical services with about 2500 employees.', 'With 26 major Clinical departments and 13 Specialised Centres, it is a multispeciality Hospital particularly noted for the Health Insurance Review & Assessment Service (HIRAS) report on the successful numbers of major cancer surgeries in Korea based on operations from 2006 to February 2007. In fact, it was ranked 1st in the  Yeungnam Region of Korea as "The World Best Hospital", selected by Newsweek, USA in April 2020.', "The Hospital invests in state of the art medical technologies namely like an advanced Dual 192 channel SOMATOM Force, 3D Mammography Unit ‘Selenia Dimensions 3D’, MRI 'Magnetom Vida', PET-MR (the first in Asia), etc to get the most accurate diagnosis and treatment along with the best medical care.", '', '', '', '', '', '']

Public transportation is available to commute; there is a bus opposite the Hospital.  Bang O is the nearest subway station and takes 3 minutes to reach. Taxis and Tuktuks are available in abundance as well.

Name: Milann Fertility Centre, Delhi
About Hospital: ["Milann forayed India's leading ART center into the capital city of India in March 2016 and started its center at the heart of South Delhi.", 'Within a short span of time, the Milann fertility center in the city has become the most sought-after IVF treatment destination not only for couples from Northern India but also from the far and breadth of the country, on the back of providing the best-in-class services in the field of infertility treatments.', 'Milann IVF and Fertility Clinic in Delhi offer the entire range of fertility treatments comprising medication, surgical procedures, and assisted conception – including Intrauterine Insemination (IUI) and In Vitro Fertilisation (IVF).', '', '', '', '', '']

Team And Speciality:
The medical personnel forms a cohesive team that works seamlessly together to ensure the best practices and its success can be attributed to the unique approach toward healthcare and fertility.
Medical experts and personnel all trained in reproductive endocrinology, clinical trials, ovarian biology, reproductive immunology and the genetics of fertility, Milan has a technological edge over its competitors.
As the best fertility hospital in Delhi, we at Millann have a track record of high success rates with IUI fertility treatments, and numerous couples have successfully achieved the conception of a baby.

Infrastructure: ['The centre is outfitted with best-in-class laboratories, infrastructure, and tools, all of which are managed by fertility-trained nurses and technicians.', 'Milann uses cutting-edge technologies such as ICSI, embryo freezing, surgical sperm retrieval, embryo biopsy, laser-assisted hatching, and blastocyst transfer.', "The hospital's success rates are higher because of useful diagnostic tools like 3D/4D ultrasound and advanced pathologies like Male Partner Semen Analysis, Hysterosalpingogram (HSG), Ovarian Reserve Testing, Urinary Luteinizing Hormone (LH), or other infertility individualised evaluation based on each woman's specific circumstances.", '']

", 'In its first two decades of operations, the hospital was deisgnated as an internship institute for medical technicians, as a training facility for millitary and also for certified personnel for mental healthcare. Name: St. Hedwig Hospital, Berlin
About Hospital: ["The St. Hedwig Hospital (SHK), located on in Berlin was founded in 1846, making it one of the capital's oldest large hospitals in the country.", 'The hospital has delivered core medical services to Berlin for over 150 years and is a part of the Alexianer Network.', 'In 2017, it was ranked as one of Germany’s top 396 hospitals in the Focus news magazine.', '', '', '', '', '']

The hospital consists of 10 medical clinics and one psychiatric clinic
The departments are namely anesthesia, intensive care medicine, internal medicine, urology, urogynecology, visceral & vascular surely - minimally invasive surgery, and the hospital also houses the German Pelvic Floor Center for psychaitry, psychotherapy, and psychomatics.
Close to 100 hardworking and experienced physicians and nurses work at the prestigious hospital.

Name: Vivantes Hospital Group
About Hospital: ['The Vivantes Hospital Group is one of the largest state-owned healthcare companies operating around 100 medical departments and institutions, rehabilitation centers, 40 centers of excellence, primary healthcare facilities, 12 nursing facilities, and other outpatient and inpatient healthcare facilities in Berlin, Germany', 'The Vivantes Hospital Group was founded in 2001 and the company runs 10 hospitals with a total capacity of nearly 6,000 beds and more than 17,000 employees, 2,300 of which are physicians.', 'The Hospitals treat nearly 2,35,622 inpatients and 3,22,503 outpatients per year. ', '', '', '', '', '']
Medical Departments: ['CARDIOLOGY AND CARDIAC SURGERY (2)', 'COSMETIC AND PLASTIC SURGERY (1)', 'GASTROENTEROLOGY (6)', 'HEMATOLOGY (3)', 'HEPATOLOGY (1)', 'NEPHROLOGY (3)', 'NEUROLOGY AND NEUROSURGERY (3)', 'ONCOLOGY AND ONCOSURGERY (4)', 'ORTHOPEDICS (10)', 'SPINE SURGERY (2)']
Team And Speciality:
The ten hospitals situated all over Berlin deliver top-quality and cutting edge medical care.
Vivantes treats over half a million patients each year in over 40 highly-specialized centers of excellence including the Aeromedical Center, Breast Center, Cancer Centers, Cardiac Rhythm Center, Cochlear Implant Center, Conservative Treatment of Liver Diseases and TumorsCraniocerebral Injury – Rehabilitation, Endoprosthetic Center, Geriatric Psychiatry Center, etc.
Many doctors of Vivantes are innovators in the highest category of medicine and are actively engaged in medical science, university education, clinical research, and active participation in the scientific associations.
More Details
Top Doctors: ['Prof. Dr. med. Martin K. Kuhlmann', 'Dr. Christian Klopf', 'MD Susanne Kopp', 'Dr. med. Suha Dasdelen']
Infrastructure: ['The Vivantes Hospital Group is Germany’s largest state-owned group of hospitals with a total capacity of some 5,600 beds and more than 15,000 employees, 1,500 of whom are doctors.', 'Vivantes operates six specially equipped “Comfort Hospitals” in Berlin, each providing first-class medical care along with comfortable accommodation and facilities such as restaurants, lounges, wifi, and daily international newspapers, magazines, and TV.', 'It runs an international department, Vivantes International Medicine, to coordinate the medical tourism for which Berlin is one of the popular destinations.', '']
Location:
The Vivantes Hospital Group consists of 10 hospitals, which are located in different parts of Berlin. Some of the most popular amongst them are listed below: 
Vivantes Humboldt-Klinikum
Vivantes Humboldt-Klinikum is situated in the north of Berlin and has over eleven specialist departments, more than 600 beds, and a Comfort Ward with extensive gardens. Roughly 65,000 patients are treated by 250 doctors here every year.
It is at a distance of 7.4 km via Berlin, Berlin-Tegel Airport. The drive takes about 15 minutes. The closest subway station is U-Bhf Rathaus Reinickendorf and the bus stop is Humboldt-Klinikum.
Vivantes Klinikum Am Urban
Vivantes Klinikum Am Urban is one of Berlin’s oldest hospitals and today offers first-class and state-of-the-art medicine. 56,000 patients are treated each year in the hospitals more than twelve specialist departments with almost 600 beds. 
It is at a distance of 13.8 km via Berlin, Berlin-Tegel Airport. The drive takes about 36 minutes. The closest subway station is U Südstern and the bus stop is Klinikum Am Urban (Berlin).
Vivantes Klinikum im Friedrichshain
Vivantes Klinikum im Friedrichshain is situated in the center of Berlin. With over 900 beds in 21 specialist departments, around 110,000 patients are treated here every year. 
It is at a distance of 15 km via Berlin, Berlin-Tegel Airport. The drive takes about 40 minutes. The closest subway station is Strausberger Platz and the tram stop is Klinikum im Friedrichshain (Berlin).
Vivantes Auguste-Viktoria-Klinikum
Vivantes Auguste-Viktoria-Klinikum is situated in Berlin’s south and offers more than 600 beds with more than 150 specialist departments and over 40 highly specialized centers of excellence in different disciplines.
It is at a distance of 14.4 km via Berlin, Berlin-Tegel Airport. The drive takes about 24 minutes. The closest subway station is Priesterweg.
Taxis and shuttles are easily available from the airport to the hospitals.
All the hospitals are close to numerous intriguing attractions filled with several restaurants and shopping centers.
